companyDescription:
Royal Schiphol Group is an airport company, owner, co-owner and partner in several Dutch and international airports. Our main airport is Amsterdam Airport Schiphol. It is the third largest airport in Europe, measured by the numbers of passengers and cargo. It has more than 2,000 employees who are guided by our 5 core values – to be reliable, efficient, hospitable, inspiring and sustainable. These values help us realise our ambitions to be Europe's Preferred Airport and the most sustainable hub airport in the world.

The magic of working at the airport is evident everywhere – whether you work in operations, at the head office or as a contractor. The complex, dynamic and diverse activities at the airport and in its job roles makes Royal Schiphol Group an ideal career hub for you.
descriptionText:
Nice to know (you)

At Schiphol, we are very ambitious when it comes to our future: we aim to operate the most sustainable airports in the world. Schiphol is committed to net-zero carbon for own emissions in 2030 and for the aviation sector by mid-century. In the past few years, Schiphol has achieved progress by many, bottom-up actions improving sustainability. We are going for it: creating the most sustainable and high-quality airports in the world. 


Connecting your world

As a Strategic Data Analyst, you will play a pivotal role in unlocking the potential of data to guide our business towards more sustainable practices. And how you approach this? That’s up to you. We trust in the way you connect with other people. You put your talents to work at:

Engaging with a broad stakeholder base to identify sustainability-related KPIs and data requirements, focusing for example on emissions, waste management, and energy efficiency. Facilitating stakeholder meetings, gather requirements, and align diverse interests towards the common goal of sustainability. Creating business value cases and prototypes, translating complex data insights into actionable sustainability strategies. Promoting data literacy and adoption within the organization, guiding teams on leveraging data products for sustainability. 


As a Strategic Data Analyst, we will develop a comprehensive overview of data flows and sources across multiple systems, culminating in the creation of a new data mart concept to be hosted on Databricks. This initiative aims to synergize data to generate greater value, with a team of data engineers from our Department executing the plan with your support.

You've got this

Schiphol connects your world. With the best people, we make travel safe and responsible. You contribute to this by analyzing problems, recognizing patterns and reasoning logically. The result? Insight and solutions. Also, you are the talent who smoothly builds strong bonds with others. In addition, for this position you have:

MSc in Business Analytics, Business Administration, Economics, Sciences, Mathematics or related fields with a strong understanding of data technologies and sustainability. Proven experience in stakeholder management, agile project management, and the ability to synthesize complex data into clear insights. Working knowledge of data-related tools, such as Python, PySpark, and experience in constructing data marts or lakes is highly desirable. Strong communication skills, adept at requirement gathering, data storytelling, and presenting outcomes. 


You get this

Schiphol connects your world. With the best people, we make travel safe and responsible. You contribute to this by analyzing problems, recognizing patterns and reasoning logically. The result? Insight and solutions. Also, you are the talent who smoothly builds strong bonds with others. In addition, for this position you have:

MSc in Business Analytics, Business Administration, Economics, Sciences, Mathematics or related fields with a strong understanding of data technologies and sustainability. Proven experience in stakeholder management, agile project management, and the ability to synthesize complex data into clear insights. Working knowledge of data-related tools, such as Python, PySpark, and experience in constructing data marts or lakes is highly desirable. Strong communication skills, adept at requirement gathering, data storytelling, and presenting outcomes. 


About The Team

The IT & Data department is creating the airport of the future. We do this using the smartest digital solutions, tools and applications. With state-of-the-art technology, we keep the airport running. Our enthusiastic team works on data-driven improvements in our processes, traveller flows and information provision. This is how we contribute to the best possible experience for travellers, customers and employees at and around the airport.

Choose your destination

What are your talents? What dreams do you have? What is your story? We are curious about you and invite you to apply. You can apply by sharing your motivation and resume with us via the application button below.

We would like to receive your application for this position of Strategic Data Analyst Sustainability before 31st of March 2024. Do you have questions about the application process? Contact Jesse Topelberg by sending a message to: jesse.topelberg@schiphol.nlFor more information about applying at Schiphol Group: Job application process - Werken bij Schiphol Group. For the safety of our passengers and colleagues, an security screening is always part of the recruitment process. 


About Schiphol Group

With 3,000 proud colleagues, we go the extra mile to connect the Netherlands with the rest of the world in the best possible way. Innovation, safety and cooperation are at the forefront. Together we give more meaning to travel and contribute to the economy and society. For more than 100 years. In the Netherlands and beyond. By the way, did you know that:

... Schiphol Group owns and operates Amsterdam Airport Schiphol, Rotterdam The Hague Airport and Lelystad Airport? We also have a majority stake in Eindhoven Airport. … Schiphol Airport has been running 100% on Dutch wind energy since 2018?wind energy. ... as a Strategic Data Analyst you will be joining the business area Data and Analytics ?
title: Strategic Data Analyst Sustainability

companyDescription:
Sia Partners is a next-generation management consulting firm and pioneer of Consulting 4.0. We offer a unique blend of AI and design capabilities, augmenting traditional consulting to deliver superior value to our clients. Counting 2,800 consultants in 19 countries, we expect to achieve USD 420 million in turnover for the current fiscal year. 

With a global footprint and expertise in more than 30 sectors and services,  we optimize client projects worldwide. Through our Consulting for Good approach, we strive for next-level impact by developing innovative CSR solutions for our clients, making sustainability a lever for profitable transformation.  

Sia Partners' mission statement is to create state-of-the-art narratives for transformation and innovation and deploy them at scale. Our purpose is to achieve transformations that generate a positive impact.
companySlogan: Optimists for Change
descriptionText:
Sia Partners is a specialist Management Consulting firm created in 1999 and has grown into a global firm with approximately 2800 employees and annual revenue exceeding $400m. Our culture is strongly orientated towards high-quality expertise and delivering excellent results and outcomes for our clients, which include a wide range of multinational companies. Our global presence and our expertise in more than 40 sectors and services allows us to accompany clients worldwide. Using innovative technologies such as our own in-house apps, social networks, and digital tools, we provide a truly integrated global service.

Through Consulting for Good, we put our expertise at the service of our clients' climate objectives and make sustainable development a performance lever for our clients. Our portfolio of offerings is cross-sectors and 17 % of our revenue is generated from engagements with a CSR focus.





Job Description

Who will you be working with?

The Amsterdam Data Science team is young, diverse and growing. You will work in a team that challenges you and invests in your professional development. We have a flat structure and rely on the entrepreneurial spirit of our colleagues. Taking the initiative is strongly encouraged. We strive for well-being, diversity and knowledge sharing within the team, so that we can grow together.

What you are going to do

As a Data & Analytics Consultant, you will work with our Data Scientists, Data Engineers and other consultants at Sia Partners Global, on various client projects in multidisciplinary teams. You will use your analytical mindset and data skills to solve complex business problems and deliver actionable insights.

Responsibilities include:Work closely with SIA consultants on assignments with an analytical challengeIdentify business problems by extracting, interpreting and explaining insights from dataDevelop statistical and analytical methods to solve specific operational problemsEnsure that the deep insights generated from advanced analytics translate into business impactPresent results and conduct workshops at customer sitesWho you areYou want to make business impact, not only by doing data analysis, but also by making recommendations through inspiring presentationsYou have the ability to adapt quickly and work across different business areas within a challenging environmentYou have exceptional analytical and quantitative problem solving skills You have the ability to work collaboratively in a team environmentYou have excellent communication skills and can present complex concepts in a synthetic wayYou have a good track record of leadership in an academic, professional or extracurricular setting.

Qualifications

What you needCompleted WO Master's degree in Statistics, Econometrics, Economics, Business Analytics or a related field of study.You are a young graduate or already have several years of experience in a similar position.Good skills in Python and at least one other analytical language (e.g. R, SQL)Experience with data visualization and reporting (e.g. Tableau, Power BI)Knowledge of Machine Learning techniques or optimization is a strong plusFluent in English and Dutch, both written and oral. Additional languages are a strong plus.What we offerTraining opportunities to develop yourself furtherOpportunities to work on international assignmentsFlexible working hoursA meritocratic approach to promotionPerformance related bonusAn attractive package (e.g. lease car, health insurance, pension scheme)

Additional Information

We are unable to provide a work permit for this position

Non-Dutch speaker will no be acceptedSia Partners is an equal opportunity employer. All aspects of employment, including hiring, promotion, remuneration, or discipline, are based solely on performance, competence, conduct, or business needs.
title: Data & Analytics Consultant

companyDescription:
Gomibo Group is the umbrella term for all the brands within our organisation: Belsimpel, Gomibo, Verifai, Tulip Assist and Gomibo SaaS (Software as a service), which all share one common goal: Giving people easy access to the digital world. 

Our story
Gomibo Group (Initially MobielWerkt B.V.) was founded in 2006, by Jeroen Doorenbos & Jeroen Elkhuizen. The telecom market was a very chaotic market, with many providers, who all claimed to have the best deal. The focus was on achieving targets, and not on the needs of the customer. Jeroen & Jeroen decided to change the mobile world, by truly putting the customer first. They made this happen by building a platform where it is easier to find what suits you. They committed themselves to treat their customers as if they were family, and by doing so, they became the initiators of a customer-oriented industry. With their drive to continuously improve , they raised the bar in the telecom industry. Think about signing the contract for your subscription via iDeal verification, a customer service that is available in the evening and on weekends, the best and most customer-friendly return options, as well as establishing your own customer-oriented phone insurance. All these changes were revolutionary and created a positive movement in the telecom industry. Our software that makes it possible to create one perfect offer out of 20 million possible combinations based on the customer's needs also contributed to this - and this was just the beginning!  

Our innovative drive has not changed to this day. By always thinking about how something can be done better and easier, we keep developing ourselves, and our organisation grows every day. With more than 700 colleagues now, we work every day to make the digital world easy to access. With this goal in mind, all the different brands of Gomibo Group were created.
companySlogan: Giving people easy access to the digital world.
descriptionText:
Analyseer en beheer ons abonnementsaanbod.

Als klanten op zoek zijn naar een nieuw mobiel abonnement, dan heb jij ervoor gezorgd dat alle aanbiedingen met de juiste informatie te vinden zijn. Je voert daarnaast analyses uit op basis van eerdere prijzen en de verkopen die daaruit voortvloeiden. Met je analytische inzicht en met gebruik van de juiste tools weet je de juiste conclusies uit de data te halen.

Wat doe je als Data Analist Abonnementen?

Als Data Analist Abonnementen houd jij je bezig met alle abonnementen en bundels op onze website. Je zorgt voor het productbeheer en je doet veel prijsanalyses: hoe is het prijsverloop van de abonnementen geweest en wat voor effect heeft dat op de sales gehad? Je bent een held met Excel en je vindt het interessant om met data aan de slag te gaan. Dankzij jouw rol bieden we onze klanten alle abonnementen aan voor de juiste prijs en met de juiste inhoud en voorwaarden.

Je bent erg zorgvuldig en je werkt secuur. Jouw aanbiedingen worden namelijk door miljoenen mensen bekeken, en een kleine fout in ons aanbod kan een groot effect hebben! Cijfertje verkeerd? Dan kunnen we honderden aankopen mislopen of duizenden euro’s verlies draaien. Bieden we een abonnement te duur aan? Dan pas je dit direct aan. Zo zorg jij ervoor dat onze klanten nooit teveel betalen. Hierin heb je veel vrijheid en dus ook veel verantwoordelijkheid. Je maakt verschillende rapportages over de verkopen van Belsimpel, waarbij je alle interne en externe informatievoorziening mee neemt en analyseert. Met deze rapportages help je ook de andere teams binnen Belsimpel in het maken van de juiste beslissingen. Het is echter niet altijd mogelijk om data-gedreven tot de beste uitkomst te komen. Regelmatig zal je op basis van logisch redeneren de beste deal samenstellen, die voor de meeste sales zullen zorgen.

De analyse en het productbeheer van ons assortiment doe je samen met je collega’s van team Telecom Data Insights. Het team bestaat voornamelijk uit studenten die net als jij parttime bij ons aan de slag zijn en daarnaast ook twee fulltimers die het commercieel contact met de providers onderhouden. Door deze mix is de sfeer supergezellig. Naast het contact met je eigen teamleden, heb je in je werk ook vaak contact met collega’s uit bijvoorbeeld het inkoop- of marketingteam om de beste deals te maken met de providers om te overleggen over prijsplannen en het abonnementsaanbod.

Zo kan je dag eruitzien

Je begint de dag met het openen van de actielijst van het team. Noëlla heeft de taken al verdeeld en samen met Martijn zorg je er voor dat alle openstaande taken vandaag gedaan worden. Het is vandaag allereerst aan jou om de performance van de nieuwsbrief te analyseren. Dit is een analytische klus, waarbij je ook de resultaten van een A/B test tegen elkaar afweegt. Ondertussen brengt Gijs van het Inkoopteam een traktatie rond voor zijn verjaardag. Nadat je aan de hand van je analyse verbeterpunten hebt doorgestuurd naar Team Marketing voor de komende nieuwsbrief, is het tijd om de mailbox bij te werken. Vanuit Team Klantenservice komt de vraag of de prijs van een abonnement op de website wel klopt. Je gaat dit na en past de prijs aan, zodat we weer scherp op de markt staan! Vervolgens maak je de maandelijkse verkooprapportage voor één van de providers. Je ziet dat de campagne goed zijn werk heeft gedaan en je kunt dit visueel uitstekend in kaart brengen.

Nadat je hebt geluncht met je teamleden, is het tijd om de nieuwe proposities van de providers te verwerken en voor de ingangsdatum klaar te zetten. Odido komt met een aantal nieuwe abonnementen en daarnaast voert KPN wat wijzigingen in de bestaande prijsplannen door. Nadat je alles hebt klaargezet valt je op dat de product plus actie van Lebara niet duidelijk op de website staat. Je gaat langs bij Marketing om ervoor te zorgen dat dit wordt aangepast. Dat zal de sales een extra boost geven!

Je sluit de dag af met de wekelijkse teammeeting, waarin iedereen elkaar op de hoogte brengt van de voortgang van de projecten waar iedereen mee bezig is. Ook bespreek je de algemene performance van Belsimpel en wordt alvast vooruit geblikt naar komende week. Nu is iedereen weer helemaal up-to-date!

Wat kun je van ons verwachten?

Wat je er voor terug krijgt

Een uurloon tussen €9,45 (18 jaar) en €14,69 (21+ jaar).

De mogelijkheid om salarisstappen te maken binnen een half jaar, afhankelijk van je ontwikkeling en inzet.

Veel benefits, zoals kortingen en sportmogelijkheden.

Hoe het past naast studeren

Werken op een mooi kantoor in het centrum van Groningen.

Shifts van 4 of 8 uur, zelf in te delen van maandag t/m vrijdag.

Een flexibele planning die past in je studierooster.

Wat je ervan kunt leren

Persoonlijke en professionele ontwikkeling staan voorop.

Trainingen, 1-op-1 begeleiding & de uitdaging die bij jou past.

Je kunt zo hard gaan als je zelf wil.

Waarom het zo gezellig is

750 collega's met dezelfde drive.

Teamuitjes, bedrijfsfeesten en -festivals, elke vrijdag een VrijMiBo.

Een sloep om te varen door de Groningse grachten.

Wie ben jij?

Je volgt een studie op WO-niveau, bij voorkeur bèta-georiënteerd. Je bent 16u per week (of meer) beschikbaar op doordeweekse dagen tussen 8:00 - 18:00. Excel houdt van jou en jij houdt van Excel, analytisch ben je dan ook ijzersterk. Je werkt secuur en hebt een groot verantwoordelijkheidsgevoel. Affiniteit met internet/webshops is een dikke plus! Je schuwt een uitdaging, verantwoordelijkheid en een beetje stress zeker niet. 

Fluency in the Dutch language is required for this role; candidates will be assessed accordingly.

Heb je vragen over deze vacature, dan kun je altijd contact opnemen met onze Talent & Recruitment Specialisten. Zij zijn op werkdagen bereikbaar tussen 9:00 en 17:30 op het telefoonnummer 050-2113856. Je kunt ook een mail sturen naar werken@belsimpel.nl.

Wil je weten hoe het sollicitatieproces eruit ziet? Klik dan hier.

Gomibo Woodstock festival

Ben jij er volgend jaar ook bij?
title: Data Analist Abonnementen (min. 16u/w)

companyDescription:
As an international family business in the agricultural sector, we spend every day making farmers’ lives easier with innovative solutions and tailored services. We offer solutions for almost all activities in the cowshed: from milking to cleaning. We provide advice on how to organise a dairy farm smartly with the use of management systems. Our vision and the needs and demands of our clients are the things that drive and inspire us.

Something we do since 1948, in this year brothers Cornelis en Arij van der Lely introduced the finger wheel rake to the market. One of our first inventions that made a substantial change in the traditional way of working on the farm. There were many more innovations with only one purpose making agrarian life easier and working together for a sustainable, profitable and enjoyable future in the agricultural sector.
descriptionText:
What is your role?

Would you like to be part of the AI service team at Lely?

Are you naturally inclined towards research and incremental innovation?

Join our team and let’s create together Lely's 2030 AI vision. We're looking for a versatile individual with expertise in building prototypes. As a member of our AI team, you'll engage with state-of-the-art technologies, analyze extensive datasets, collaborate on the future AI advancements at Lely, and transform data into actionable insights that fuel innovation.

The role

Utilizing your expertise in statistical analysis and programming languages such as Python, you will identify trends, patterns, and correlations within the data. Your role will also involve creating visualizations to communicate findings to stakeholders. Collaborating closely with cross-functional teams, you will play a vital role in designing experiments, testing hypotheses, to enhance our products and services.We look for a hands-on Data analyst that enjoys quick experimentation and creating prototypes to validate ideas.You will work mainly on data exploration, descriptive analytics, and creating POC models.Your focus will be on understanding historical data trends, patterns, providing actionable insights and develop experiments based on that.Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify business challenges and develop solutions and fulfill business needs.Comfortable using storytelling to convey data insights.

What is your experience?

Your responsibilities include data cleaning, exploratory data analysis (EDA), visualization, and creating dashboards/reports.Proficiency in data manipulation tools (SQL, databricks) and visualization tools.Knowledge of statistics and research methods is important.Experienced with Azure cloud is a plus.Knowledge of ML / modelling / LLM would be an asset.Acquainted with Agile framework.You bring an entrepreneurial attitude complemented by a proactive mindset. You see challenges as opportunities, always focused on achieving results.You have great communication skills

What do we offer you?

A job for a true inventor, at a company driven by innovation. You will see your ideas come to life as they leave the factory to our customer, the dairy farmer. At the end you will contribute to a sustainable way of farming.

We offer..

flexibility in terms of working times and conditions;variety one day you will be at the workshop, another day on the farm and the next day you will work at the main office;the space and freedom to innovate, construct new ideas and tinker in our workshop;40 holidays per year; Salary up to a maximum of €5,500 gross per month, where we would like to see there is still room for growth;the tastiest coffee you will ever drink, courtesy of our barista;time for fun: table football, volleyball and a basketball court.

Recruitment or Consulting agency?

We appreciate your interest, but we are sourcing all our candidates directly. We understand you are trying to offer your candidates interesting jobs at an innovative company like Lely but consider that any unsolicited profiles you send us will be treated as direct applications.

About Lely

Lely, founded in 1948, directs all its efforts towards creating a sustainable, profitable and enjoyable future in farming. Circling the cow, the company develops premium robotics and data systems that increase animal welfare, flexibility and the production on the dairy farm. For more than 75 years, Lely has been leading in the sale and service of automated milking systems to successive generations of dairy farmers across the globe. Every day, Lely inspires her employees to offer customers innovative solutions and be a reliable partner for long-term advice and support. With her Head office in The Netherlands and a worldwide network of dedicated Lely Center locations for tailor-made sales and support, the Lely Group is active in more than 45 countries and employs around 2400 people.
title: Data Analyst AI Team

companyDescription:
Founded by Yvon Chouinard in 1973, Patagonia is an outdoor apparel company based in Ventura, California. A certified B-Corporation, Patagonia’s mission is to  save our home planet.

The company is recognized internationally for its commitment to authentic product quality and environmental activism, donating 1% of sales annually, contributing over $100 million in grants and in-kind donations since 1985.

We’re always looking for motivated people to join us in our retail stores; at our Ventura, California headquarters; Reno, Nevada Service Center; and occasionally in our overseas offices. We’re especially interested if you love spending as much time as possible in the mountains or the wild, feel more at home in a base camp or on the river than an office, and have a passion for something outside of yourself, whether for surfing or opera, climbing or gardening, skiing or community activism.
 
Learn more about who we are and how we hire by visiting our Careers website at http://www.patagonia.com/us/careers.
companySlogan: We're in business to save our home planet.
descriptionText:
Patagonia is an outdoor apparel company founded in 1973. At a time when all life on earth is under threat of extinction, we aim to use the resources we have—our business, our investments, our voice and our imagination—to influence changes needed to protect our planet. A registered B Corporation and founding member of 1% for the Planet, Patagonia is recognized internationally for its commitment to product quality and environmental activism, contributing over $145 million in grants and in-kind donations to thousands of grassroots environmental groups around the world.

Your role:

We are in business to save our home planet. You’ll be helping us achieve this by playing a key role within the Data & Analytics Lifecycle and assisting with the testing and maintenance of data and analytics ecosystem for two supply chain, demand planning and warehouse logistics projects.

Main tasks: 

 Participate in design and architecture sessions with business and system analysts, reviewing documented business processes and gathering and documenting system requirements within two supply chain, demand planning and warehouse logistics projects; Perform data validation in the framework of the two projects; Adjust data models as requested by business stakeholders; Work with the overall IT team, business analysts and external developers to plan and execute various project work as needed; Perform and support structured end-to-end testing cycle within the projects; Develop stored procedures and write technical documentation and specifications, when needed; Communicate and transfer knowledge to the relevant business and system analysts and other key users.

What we’re looking for:

 A love of the outdoors A passion for saving our home planet and making a positive impact through your work Background in data analytics and 3-4 years of working experience in SQL and Reporting Experience with supply chain, demand planning and warehouse logistics contexts Strong written and verbal communication skills in English, especially related to articulating technical specifications and communicating complex information clearly and concisely Able to work independently and with minimum supervision, but also to collaborate (agile) across the organization Critical thinking and problem solving skills Attention to details Curious, proactive and analytical mindset Experience with DevOps processes, code deployment via GitHub (or similar) and DBT is a nice to have.

Other important details:

 This is a fixed term full-time vacancy, based in Amsterdam, intended to support the team for 12 months. If you’re successful in the selection process, we will offer you a 12 months fixed-term contract. We have a hybrid work model, working from home for maximum 3 (full-time roles) days per week. We strive to make unbiased decisions and to offer a great experience to every person who applies for a role at Patagonia. Our interviews include standardized questions that focus on the aspects that are important for success in the role.

To find out more about what we offer our employees click here: https://eu.patagonia.com/nl/en/what-we-offer/

At Patagonia, we commit to becoming an anti-racist company that leads by example. This means doing the work to be inclusive and equitable, across all aspects of our business.

Every person who applies to join Patagonia receives equal employment opportunities, and we value a welcoming environment where each member of our EMEA team feels included, respected and empowered, regardless of their race, colour, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, civil status, national origin, disability or age.

At Patagonia, we strive to have inclusive representation within our organisation and embrace a diverse mix of talent to contribute to our culture. We actively seek applications from Black and People of Colour (BPOC) and other underrepresented groups.

As we are in business to save our home planet, we can only do this together.

Please make sure that your CV and cover letter are in English.

Disclaimer for recruitment agencies:

Thanks for your interest in supporting us for this role, but we don’t accept unsolicited CVs from recruitment agencies.
title: Data Analyst (f/m/d) – Fixed term contract (12month)

companyDescription:
Same-old wasn’t working for us – so we created something new. Since arriving on the scene from Amsterdam in 2013, we’ve been changing the eyewear game with our thoughtfully designed frames, transparent pricing, and original collabs with some of the most exciting creative minds out there.

We’ve got our eye on greater things still. Our goal is to be a driver of positive change in the eyewear industry for people and planet. We’ve made inroads as a B Corp. The endgame? Reach net-zero emissions by 2050.

What we believe in:

- Come as you are

We’re a diverse, international bunch — and we wouldn’t have it any other way. It’s what makes us unique, after all. We embrace inclusivity, champion equity, and respect all points of view. True to our Dutch roots, we’re down-to-earth and encourage everyone to be themselves. Always.

- Work hard, but take it easy

Yes, we take the serious stuff seriously. We’re ambitious, hard workers, with big goals and ideas that require passion, effort, and collaboration. But we also try to have fun along the way! We celebrate our wins, share our failures, and bring optimism and positivity to every new challenge we face. Teamwork is where we get seriously good at what we do; we love challenging ourselves and learning from each other in order to move forward.

- Help us create actual change

Our mission is to be a driver of positive change within the eyewear industry. We’re very proud to be a certified B-Corp, but we still have a long way to go. As a maker & seller of things, we know that the actions we take have an impact on both the natural environment and on the communities where we engage. We’re working hard to reduce our environmental impact, and to ensure our employees & wider stakeholders stay healthy, balanced, and are treated with respect and dignity.
companySlogan: Take another look. We’re out to shake up the industry with bold new perspectives on all-things eyewear.
descriptionText:
Hi there, potential colleague! Join us in our mission to become a driver of positive change in the eyewear industry.
Get ready to make a real impact in a certified B Corp as our new All-round Data Professional.We are looking for an analytical, result-driven and social all round data professional to contribute to the company’s continuous growth.
You will support all Ace&Tate departments (including the Leadership Team) and have some projects of your own. As a Business & Strategy Analyst you will have the opportunity to make a significant impact on the company’s decisions by providing the business with data, analyses, and insights. 
This full time position is immediately available at our Amsterdam HQ. You'll be...Acting as an internal consultant, helping different business stakeholders understand their problems & needs and assist them in making informed decisions on how to tackle thoseHandling complex data projects (multiple stakeholders, multiple integrated systems, full responsibility)Learning to have a full understanding of the business processes and switch between different business domainsIncorporating long term strategic analysis activities into the businessMaking sure data and reports are available to the different business units, allowing them to understand business performance and to analyse data themselves when neededWorking on both analytical engineering and business analyst projects, ranging from ELT to strategic analyses for company directives
You...Have 4-7 years work experience in the field of BI, analytics engineering, data engineering or computer/data science Have proven skills working with datasets in a cloud data warehouse environment, preferably having worked withGoogle Cloud Platform, Big Query in combination with dbtHave proven skills working in data analytics, having preferably worked withMS Excel, Google SheetsLooker Studio, TableauA SQL-based environment Love crunching numbers and possess excellent analytical skillsHave excellent communication skills in English, both verbal and writtenEnjoy working as part of dynamic & motivated company, not shying away from amazing cross-functional projects with your colleaguesBelieve in the Ace & Tate concept and love the product!
What's in it for you...Being part of a young and very ambitious team;A flexible hybrid work environment (minimum of two/three days per week at our HQ in Amsterdam is required);Personal development opportunities;We care about you; hence we provide you with gym discounts and unlimited access to an online-psychologist OpenUp;25 holidays per year (based on full time) plus additional tenure based days;Travel reimbursement if you live more than 10kms from our HQ;Company pension plan;The chance to be involved with every aspect of a rapidly growing companyDaily nutritious lunch;Participation in events planned by our CultureClub (e.g. Borrel XXL, &talks, holiday gifting, ...);Continuous updates of your eyewear collection! 
Jeez, that was a lot. Still with us? If you are, and you’re thinking that you might fit this profile, please apply via the form below. We’d love to hear from you! 
Excited, but in need of a bit more information? We are more than happy to welcome you here at our office (or somewhere else) for an introductory coffee. 
Ace & Tate is an equal opportunity employer. We are committed to nurturing an inclusive environment for all current and potential employees.
title: All-round Data Professional: Business Analyst & Analytics Engineer

companyDescription: Palo Alto Networks, the global cybersecurity leader, is shaping the cloud-centric future with technology that is transforming the way people and organizations operate. Our mission is to be the cybersecurity partner of choice, protecting our digital way of life. We help address the world's greatest security challenges with continuous innovation that seizes the latest breakthroughs in artificial intelligence, analytics, automation, and orchestration. By delivering an integrated platform and empowering a growing ecosystem of partners, we are at the forefront of protecting tens of thousands of organizations across clouds, networks, and mobile devices. Our vision is a world where each day is safer and more secure than the one before. For more information, visit www.paloaltonetworks.com.
companySlogan: Our mission is to be the cybersecurity partner of choice, protecting our digital way of life.
descriptionText:
Company Description

Our Mission

At Palo Alto Networks® everything starts and ends with our mission:

Being the cybersecurity partner of choice, protecting our digital way of life.

Our vision is a world where each day is safer and more secure than the one before. We are a company built on the foundation of challenging and disrupting the way things are done, and we’re looking for innovators who are as committed to shaping the future of cybersecurity as we are.

Our Approach to Work

We lead with flexibility and choice in all of our people programs. We have disrupted the traditional view that all employees have the same needs and wants. We offer personalization and offer our employees the opportunity to choose what works best for them as often as possible - from your wellbeing support to your growth and development, and beyond!

At Palo Alto Networks, we believe in the power of collaboration and value in-person interactions. This is why our employees generally work from the office three days per week, leaving two days for choice and flexibility to work where you feel most effective. This setup fosters casual conversations, problem-solving, and trusted relationships. While details may evolve, our goal is to create an environment where innovation thrives, with office-based teams coming together three days a week to collaborate and thrive, together!

Job Description

Your Career

As a member of the Unit 42, National Security (NATSEC) team, you will be working closely with a globally distributed team of threat researchers and malware reverse engineers. You will be embedded into a team where you will track cyber criminals, ransomware groups, and advanced persistent threats in support of sensitive customer intelligence requirements.

Your Impact

Provide timely and actionable intelligence to support customer intelligence requirementsLeverage global datasets (netflow, malware, passive DNS, etc) to track malicious cyber actors, their infrastructure and campaigns Reverse engineer malware via static/dynamic methods as well as interpret Assembly through the utilization of a disassembling or debugging toolCollaborate with a global team of threat intelligence analysts to analyze and develop coverage for emerging threatsDevelop strategic threat assessments in support of customer needsCommunicate with product engineering teams to improve detection efficacy in our ecosystem of products

Qualifications

Your Experience

Have or be eligible for a Level B Security ClearanceExperience working with government agenciesBS/MS in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or 5+ years of experience as a cleared threat intelligence analyst or equivalent military experience requiredExperience tracking advanced persistent threat groups Working knowledge of BigQuery Proficiency in PythonFamiliar with static and dynamic malware analysis and common industry toolsFamiliar with common tactics, techniques, and procedures used by cyber threat actors to conduct network reconnaissance and intrusions, including knowledge of the MITRE ATT&CK Matrix for enterprise and individual techniquesStrong knowledge of cyber security threat actors, particularly their tactics, techniques, procedures, tooling, and noteworthy attacksExperience leveraging netflow, passive DNS, IP registration, malware telemetry, and other data sets to form comprehensive threat assessments Experience working with information security teams such as fusion centers, security operations centers, vulnerability threat management, security incident management, threat hunting, and data analyticsExcellent time management, often working under tight deadlines and multiple assignmentsOutstanding verbal and written communication skillsComfortable with creating and delivering presentations in a range of environments, from industry conferences to customer briefingsNative level English fluency, any other languages a plus

Additional Information

The Team

Unit 42 brings together our world-renowned threat researchers with an elite team of security consultants to create an intelligence-driven, response ready organization. The Unit 42 Threat Intelligence team provides threat research that enables security teams to understand adversary intent and attribution, while enhancing protections offered by our products and services to stop advanced attacks. As threats escalate, Unit 42 is available to advise customers on the latest risks, assess their readiness, and help them recover when the worst occurs.

Our Commitment

We’re trailblazers that dream big, take risks, and challenge cybersecurity’s status quo. It’s simple: we can’t accomplish our mission without diverse teams innovating, together.

We are committed to providing reasonable accommodations for all qualified individuals with a disability. If you require assistance or accommodation due to a disability or special need, please contact us at accommodations@paloaltonetworks.com.

Palo Alto Networks is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity in our workplace, and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, color, family or medical care leave, gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, medical condition, national origin, physical or mental disability, political affiliation, protected veteran status, race, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, or other legally protected characteristics.

All your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines.

Is role eligible for Immigration Sponsorship?: Yes
title: Senior Threat Intelligence Analyst - Unit42

companyDescription: TELUS International AI Data Solutions partners with a diverse and vibrant community to help our customers enhance their AI and machine learning models. The work of our AI Community contributes to improving technology and the digital experiences of many people around the world. Our AI Community works in our proprietary AI training platform handling all data types (text, images, audio, video and geo) across 500+ languages and dialects. We offer flexible work-from-home opportunities and Onsite jobs in many regions for people with a passion for languages. We have both part-time jobs with no fixed schedule and onsite full-time jobs. Whoever you are, wherever you come from, come join our global AI Community. www.telusinternational.com
descriptionText:
TELUS International AI-Data Solutions partners with a diverse and vibrant community to help our customers enhance their AI and machine learning models. The work of our AI Community contributes to improving technology and the digital experiences of many people around the world. Our AI Community works in our proprietary AI training platform handling all data types (text, images, audio, video and geo) across 500+ languages and dialects. We offer flexible work-from-home opportunities for people with passion for languages. The jobs are part-time, and there is no fixed schedule. Whoever you are, wherever you come from, come join our global AI community.  We are hiring freelance (English & Dutch speaking) Online Data Analysts for a project aimed at improving the content and quality of digital maps, which are used by millions of users globally. The job would suit someone who is detail-oriented, likes doing research and has a good knowledge of national and local geography. This is a freelance position on a flexible schedule - you can work in your own time whenever work is available. You will be completing research and evaluation tasks in a web-based environment, eg verifying and comparing data, determining the relevance and accuracy of information. You will be provided with guidelines for each task, which need to be followed. The project offers a variety of tasks, and work is paid per task. 
RequirementsFull Professional Proficiency in English & DutchYou must be living in Netherlands the last 2 consecutive yearsAbility to follow guidelines and do research online using search engines, online maps and website informationYou must have familiarity with current and historical business, media, sport, news, social media and cultural affairs in NetherlandsBeing open to work across a diverse set of Task Types (e.g. Maps, News, Audio tasks, Relevance)Applicants must be 18 years or over. 
Working on this project will require you to go through a standard recruitment process (including passing an open book assessment). This is a long-term project and your work will occasionally be subject to quality assurance checks. 
Why Join the TELUS International AI Community? Earn additional income with flexible hours to fit your lifestyleBetter work-life balanceBe your own bossComplimentary Well-Being package encompassing a wealth of well-being resources.Be part of an online community
PaymentRate of pay per task is inclusive of reading task guidelines. Payment will be issued in accordance with the terms of the contributor agreement upon successful completion of tasks. 
What’s next? If this sounds like a role you’d be interested in taking on, please apply below. https://jobs.telusinternational.com/en_US/careers/PipelineDetail/Online-Data-Analyst-The-Netherlands/21408

We are hiring freelance (English & Dutch speaking) Online Data Analysts for a project aimed at improving the content and quality of digital maps, which are used by millions of users globally. The job would suit someone who is detail-oriented, likes doing research and has a good knowledge of national and local geography.
This is a freelance position on a flexible schedule - you can work in your own time whenever work is available. You will be completing research and evaluation tasks in a web-based environment, eg verifying and comparing data, determining the relevance and accuracy of information. You will be provided with guidelines for each task, which need to be followed. The project offers a variety of tasks, and work is paid per task.

Requirements
Full Professional Proficiency in English & DutchYou must be living in Netherlands the last 2 consecutive yearsAbility to follow guidelines and do research online using search engines, online maps and website informationYou must have familiarity with current and historical business, media, sport, news, social media and cultural affairs in NetherlandsBeing open to work across a diverse set of Task Types (e.g. Maps, News, Audio tasks, Relevance)Applicants must be 18 years or over.

Working on this project will require you to go through a standard recruitment process (including passing an open book assessment). This is a long-term project and your work will occasionally be subject to quality assurance checks.

Important notice: TELUS International will never request a monetary deposit for any role or project with the company, and our recruitment and sourcing teams only use @telusinternational.com or @telusinternational.ai addresses when emailing candidates. If you are unsure as to whether a job offer is legitimate, please contact us at TI_AICommunitySupport@telusinternational.com for confirmation.


All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, or protected veteran status.

You can apply through Apply button or use this link:
https://telusinternational.headway.ai/searchResults/REQ_ID_3961/?org_id=0a5c9b71-5020

companyDescription:
With over 25 years in the technology recruitment sector, Square One is an award-winning specialist recruitment agency. Based in London, we manage recruitment on an international scale with clients ranging from start-ups to global corporations. Our goal is to offer a comprehensive recruitment service for our clients, building long-term relationships with them to ensure candidates receive the best career opportunities possible.
 
Our consultants continually upskill, ensuring that they're at the forefront of industry, market and technology changes to better help with what your business needs to succeed.
 
Across permanent and contract roles, we place into the following sectors:
 
Blockchain | Cloud | Cyber Security | Development | Digital & Creative | Emerging Technologies | EV | Gaming | Infrastructure | MS Dynamics | Oracle | SAP | Telecommunications

Our Awards & Nominations
Top 100 Best Small Companies to Work For in the UK (ranked 16th) | Top 10 Recruitment Companies to Work For in the UK (ranked 10th) | Top 10 Best Small Companies to Work For in London (ranked 6th) | TIARA Best Recruitment Company to Work For (£50m+) Nominee
companySlogan: Ranked 16th in the Top 100 Best Small Companies to Work For in the UK
descriptionText:
Job Title: Senior Deep Learning Quantitative ResearcherLocation: Amsterdam (Relocation for you and your family available to the successful person) Salary/Rate: Base salary can go up to €500,000k plus huge bonus for the right candidateStart Date: ASAP - can wait for those with 12 month non-competeJob Type: Permanent
MUST HAVE WORKED FOR OR CURRENTLY WORKING FOR A LEADING SYSTEMATIC HFT OR OPTIONS MARKET MAKING COMPANY (Non-negotiable!)
** Opportunity to build your own team - if you wanted to **
Market expertise can be in any of the below: Stock marketEquities Financial Derivatives Crypto 
Job Responsibilities/Objectives:
Leveraging machine learning techniques for the creation and implementation of statistical arbitrage tactics;Investigating novel trading concepts through the analysis of market data;Crafting features and models for forecasting the behaviour of numerous securities within a 10-second to 10-minute timeframe, spanning diverse underlying's;Collaborating with machine learning pipelines to facilitate the evolution of the strategy development process;Ensuring the ongoing optimization and enhancement of current models for consistent performance;Engaging in effective communication with internal teams;Providing guidance and, if applicable, taking a leadership role in mentoring team members.
Required Skills/ExperienceThe ideal candidate will have the following:
Having multiple years of pertinent experience within HFT organizations;Must have worked for or currently working for a leading HFT or Options Market making companyPossessing extensive proficiency in utilizing ML models for HFT strategies;Demonstrating the know-how and hands-on capability in managing ML pipelines across multiple exchanges individually or collectively;Experienced in constructing sophisticated statistical arbitrage strategies that capitalize on price differentials among two or more instruments;Expressing a keen interest in deepening knowledge in high-frequency trading and applying it across numerous exchanges;Competent in handling the entire pipeline, encompassing data sampling, feature creation, and deploying strategies in a production environment;Exhibiting proficiency in at least one programming language, with a preference for Python;
Bonus:Experience in mentoring, people management, and leading interns or a team of researchers.
Benefits & PerksThe company offers standard corporate benefits, including:
Leading and unparalleled base salary and bonus (fixed or variable (you choose))Performance-based bonusesResponsibility for the codebase of a trading firm.Relocation to Amsterdam, payment of your house/flat for the first month and assistance find a place to liveMany more benefitsExtensive private medical for you and your family
Email oliver.silver@squareoneresources.com if you have any questions
recruiter/headline: Sales Director at Square One Resources
title: Deep Learning Quantitative Researcher

RequirementsFull Professional Proficiency in English & DutchYou must be living in Netherlands the last 2 consecutive yearsAbility to follow guidelines and do research online using search engines, online maps and website informationYou must have familiarity with current and historical business, media, sport, news, social media and cultural affairs in NetherlandsBeing open to work across a diverse set of Task Types (e.g. Maps, News, Audio tasks, Relevance)Applicants must be 18 years or over. 
Working on this project will require you to go through a standard recruitment process (including passing an open book assessment). This is a long-term project and your work will occasionally be subject to quality assurance checks. 
Why Join the TELUS International AI Community? Earn additional income with flexible hours to fit your lifestyleBetter work-life balanceBe your own bossComplimentary Well-Being package encompassing a wealth of well-being resources.Be part of an online community
PaymentRate of pay per task is inclusive of reading task guidelines. Payment will be issued in accordance with the terms of the contributor agreement upon successful completion of tasks. 
What’s next? If this sounds like a role you’d be interested in taking on, please apply below. https://jobs.telusinternational.com/en_US/careers/PipelineDetail/Online-Data-Analyst-The-Netherlands/21408

companyDescription: Accenture is a global professional services company with leading capabilities in digital, cloud and security. Combining unmatched experience and specialized skills across more than 40 industries, we offer Strategy and Consulting, Technology and Operations services and Accenture Song — all powered by the world’s largest network of Advanced Technology and Intelligent Operations centers. Our 710,000 people deliver on the promise of technology and human ingenuity every day, serving clients in more than 120 countries. We embrace the power of change to create value and shared success for our clients, people, shareholders, partners and communities. Visit us at https://www.accenture.com
companySlogan: We deliver on the promise of technology and human ingenuity. Let there be change.
descriptionText:
Are you ready to play a crucial role in solving technical data issues for leading companies in the world? You’ll work on innovative projects and develop your career, collaborating with the best teams in the world. At Accenture Song we offer you the right toolkit to further boost your career and seize great opportunities. We are looking for passionate, curious and team driven players who are ready to push the boundaries.

Your job With your efforts as a Data Analytics Consultant you play an important role in managing the marketing channels of our clients more effectively. You do this by implementing various systems that enable the collection, organization and insight of data. Think of Google Tag Manager, Google Analytics, Relay42 and Tealium. Before you start working on this, you first analyze the websites / apps of our clients and convert your findings into concrete web analytics measurement plans. Together with the client you determine which goals you want to measure and which data must be collected for this.

You then develop and supervise the briefings in which the technical adjustments are described, so that the data collection can be carried out in accordance with the measurement plan. We are increasingly establishing connections with CRM systems or other relevant data sources that enrich the profiles of the target groups and ensure that we can realize even more targeted (automated) marketing campaigns. We use data management platforms (DMPs) for this and in your role you are regularly involved in the (complex) implementation of these platforms.

Who We Are

Accenture Song accelerates growth and value for our clients through sustained customer relevance. Our capabilities span ideation to execution: growth, product, and experience design; technology and experience platforms; creative, media and marketing strategy and campaign, content and channel orchestration. Join us and bring to life bold ideas with the biggest impact through the unlimited potential of creativity, technology, and intelligence. Visit us at: www.accenture.com/song.

Song is one of five services that make up one Accenture – the others are Strategy & Consulting, Technology, Operations, and Industry X.

Here's What You'll Need


A completed Bachelor’s or Master's degree.

3-5 years of hands-on experience with implementing Customer Data Platforms, Server-side Data collection, platforms (such as) Google BigQuery.

Hands-on experience in writing Javascript code and preferably knowledge about HTML, CSS, Python and/or SQL.

You have the ambition to work for international clients and you have great communication skills.

Fluent in English, both verbally and written.

You are a real team player, client oriented and service minded. A true organizer who is able to keep a good overview and set the right priorities.


Bonus point if you


Have knowledge of digital marketing / advertising.

Have a (emerging) passion for data, personalisation and coding.

Are fluent in Dutch, both verbally and written.


What's In It For You

Accenture is a global company with a world-class brand and reputation. Our people are Change Makers, and to support them as an employer, we make five promises:


Work with flexibility, in a culture based on trust

Embrace a sustainable growth mindset

Live a human-led culture of Inclusion & Diversity by caring deeply for all our people.

Lead and transform our clients with technology

Connect with our global network of 700.000 colleagues.


These promises are reflected through our excellent employee benefits, including:


Unlimited learning: access to thousands of free courses, classes and workshops.

Flexible working hours (4x9) & work location.

Paid transport (budget for electric bicycle or car, NS-Business card).

Parental leave, Paternity leave for all non-birthing parents.

Pension scheme, discount on Accenture shares, annual bonus, collective health insurance scheme.


What we believe Accenture is an equal opportunity employer. Our leaders are committed to building a better, stronger and more equitable company for future generations to create positive, long-lasting change. Inclusion and diversity are fundamental to our culture and core values. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. Our rich diversity makes us more innovative and creative, which helps us better serve our clients and our communities.

Our position as partner to many of the world’s leading businesses, organizations and governments affords us both an extraordinary opportunity and a tremendous responsibility to make a difference. Sustainability is one of our greatest responsibilities, which we embed it into everything we do and for everyone we work with.

Accenture is committed to providing equal employment opportunities for all. Please let us know if you require reasonable accommodation to enable your participation in the recruitment process by emailing lisette.werkman@accenture.com. We will be happy to assist you.
title: (Senior) Data Analytics Consultant

companyDescription: Turntwo connects business strategies with digital marketing, data, technology, and the organization. That is what we do. Pragmatic and sustainable. As part of your team. Our ultimate goal is to help you grow.
companySlogan: We connect business strategies with digital marketing, data, technology and the organization.
descriptionText:
Ready to pioneer the future of Marketing Data & Analytics?
Your role at TurntwoAs a customer-focused Marketing Data Consultant / Analyst (32-40 hrs), you're the 'go-to person' for all things marketing & customer data-related. You play a pivotal role in gathering and structuring data to generate actionable insights and opportunities for our clients. Operationalizing this data across marketing channels is also a crucial aspect of your role. You will closely collaborate with our clients and consultants to achieve the best possible results together.
Your work
Collect and combine data from various marketing and customer systems.Work with large amounts of customer, marketing and product data and develop models on top of that.Create reports and dashboards that visualize new, actionable insights and opportunities.Activate data in operational systems, like marketing channels (e.g., Google/Meta), Customer Data Platforms (CDP), or Marketing Automation systems.Stay ahead of industry trends and emerging technologies to continuously enhance our data capabilities and offerings.Act as a trusted advisor to our clients
Your experience
2-4 years of experience in a similar role (medior/senior). Consultancy experience is a big plus.Significant experience in SQL; experience with Python, R, and/or JavaScript is a plus.Experience with cloud data platforms like GCP / AWS / Azure and data solutions such as BigQuery or Snowflake. At Turntwo, we primarily work with GCP.Familiarity with tools like dbt, Google Dataform, Looker (Studio), PowerBI, or similar systems is a plus.Know how digital marketing platforms workExperience with analytics tools like Google Analytics, and martech like CDP/Marketing Automation is a plus.Bachelor's / Master's level.Fluent in English. Dutch is a plus.
What we'd love to see in you
You're curious and show ambition & entrepreneurship.Hands-on mentality: flexible, independent, and goal-oriented.You focus on creating value for our clients through a combination of marketing/business skills and deep technical knowledge.Strong analytical abilities; you can translate data into concrete actions and opportunities.Team player with strong communication skills.Affinity for Marketing Technology & Digital Analytics.Residing in the Netherlands is required.
What's in it for you?
A competitive salary and performance-related bonus, because you share in the success you create for Turntwo and our clients.You will joing asone the first employees (currently we're a team of 4) and have the opportunity to grow with us as entrepreneurs.Learn from two experienced consultants with a combined experience of over 30 years in the marketing, data & analytics world.Growth! A personalized development plan, mentorship and additional training (both on tech and consultancy skills). Although we're a startup, we have extensive experience in guiding your development.An office in Amsterdam, flexible work hours, and the possibility to work from home.
About us
Turntwo was founded in 2022 by two seasoned digital marketing consultants with a passion for data. Located in Amsterdam, we work for about 15 well-known clients in the Netherlands and Europe. Our goal is to build a talented team that, together with our clients, is making a significant impact ("Turning Forward Together"). Our strength lies in creating value through the combination of digital marketing expertise and the pragmatic use of data and marketing technology. Share this passion? We'd love to hear from you!
Next steps
Ready to be part of our team and build both Turntwo and the success of our clients together? We'd love to hear from you!
If you have any questions or are unsure if you meet the profile, don't hesitate to reach out (krisjan@turntwo.com); we can always have a quick chat!
recruiter/headline: Turning Insights into Impact @ Turntwo
title: Marketing Data & Analytics Consultant

companyDescription:
Gomibo Group is the umbrella term for all the brands within our organisation: Belsimpel, Gomibo, Verifai, Tulip Assist and Gomibo SaaS (Software as a service), which all share one common goal: Giving people easy access to the digital world. 

Our story
Gomibo Group (Initially MobielWerkt B.V.) was founded in 2006, by Jeroen Doorenbos & Jeroen Elkhuizen. The telecom market was a very chaotic market, with many providers, who all claimed to have the best deal. The focus was on achieving targets, and not on the needs of the customer. Jeroen & Jeroen decided to change the mobile world, by truly putting the customer first. They made this happen by building a platform where it is easier to find what suits you. They committed themselves to treat their customers as if they were family, and by doing so, they became the initiators of a customer-oriented industry. With their drive to continuously improve , they raised the bar in the telecom industry. Think about signing the contract for your subscription via iDeal verification, a customer service that is available in the evening and on weekends, the best and most customer-friendly return options, as well as establishing your own customer-oriented phone insurance. All these changes were revolutionary and created a positive movement in the telecom industry. Our software that makes it possible to create one perfect offer out of 20 million possible combinations based on the customer's needs also contributed to this - and this was just the beginning!  

Our innovative drive has not changed to this day. By always thinking about how something can be done better and easier, we keep developing ourselves, and our organisation grows every day. With more than 700 colleagues now, we work every day to make the digital world easy to access. With this goal in mind, all the different brands of Gomibo Group were created.
companySlogan: Giving people easy access to the digital world.
descriptionText:
Drive, ambitie & out-of-the-box denken.

Online marketing is een van de belangrijkste drijfveren voor een snelgroeiend telecombedrijf als Belsimpel | Gomibo. In deze functie houd je je dan ook bezig met het opzetten en analyseren van Google Ads, Microsoft Ads en andere online marketingcampagnes. Het analyseren van data is niet alleen de toekomst, het is ook jouw passie.

Wat doe je als Data Analist Marketing?

Het Data Driven-team streeft er elke dag weer naar om de beste online marketingcampagnes op te zetten. Binnen het team werken onze developers, data scientists en data driven marketeers (data analisten) intensief met elkaar samen om ervoor te zorgen dat we onze SEA campagnes continu blijven verbeteren. Onze marketing bevindt zich op een topniveau en jij zorgt ervoor dat we dit zo houden. Je monitort en optimaliseert onze huidige campagnes door het analyseren van de grote hoeveelheid beschikbare data.

Doordat een steeds groter deel van het opzetten en onderhouden van onze online campagnes geautomatiseerd wordt, blijft er veel tijd over voor andere zaken. Je houdt je onder andere bezig met het schrijven van rapportages waarin je reflecteert op de prestaties van de afgelopen periode. Welke campagnes zijn goed gegaan? Welke campagnes verdienen juist wat extra aandacht? Je hebt hierbij een signalerende rol en zorgt ervoor dat de nodige aanpassingen worden gemaakt. Jouw bevindingen worden ook gebruikt voor het opzetten van nieuwe campagnes bijvoorbeeld voor de nieuwste iPad of Samsung telefoon. Een belangrijke klus aangezien er veel geld in de campagnes omgaat.

Daarnaast werken we binnen het team projectmatig aan verschillende uitdagende projecten. Je werkt grotendeels zelfstandig maar soms ook samen met een ervaren collega. Een voorbeeld hiervan is het creëren van een model dat retourzendingen analyseert en voorspelt. Een ander project kan zijn het ontwikkelen en implementeren van een algoritme dat opvallende prestaties in onze campagnes automatisch detecteert. Juist deze projecten zorgen voor optimalisaties op de lange termijn, waardoor we nóg slimmer en efficiënter kunnen werken. Ook als de oplossing niet direct voor de hand ligt, vind jij het leuk om je hier in vast te bijten totdat het gelukt is!

Als parttime collega werk je ongeveer de helft van je tijd aan projecten. De andere helft besteed je aan structurele taken gerelateerd aan monitoring en rapportage. Een leuke mix dus! Data driven marketing is booming business. Je werkt op het randje van innovatie en zorgt ervoor dat we elke dag verder optimaliseren. Tijdens je werk is er volop de ruimte voor eigen inbreng en nieuwe ideeën. Als jij groeit, groeien wij immers mee. Zo krijg je de kans om echt alles uit jezelf te halen en vanaf dag één het verschil te maken.

Zo kan je dag eruitzien

Je start de dag met de Google Ads-data van afgelopen week. Je krijgt een lach op je gezicht: advertising heeft een flink aandeel geleverd aan de sterke prestaties van afgelopen week. Gelijk analyseer je welke veranderingen hiertoe geleid hebben en dit verwerk je in een nieuw plan. Daarna is het tijd om de campagne voor onze gloednieuwe samenwerking met het merk Samsung te analyseren. Deze campagne liep helaas minder goed dan verwacht. Je gaat er eens goed voor zitten. Waar komt dit door? Is er iets wat we in het vervolg nóg beter kunnen doen? En hoe kunnen we dat dan aanpakken? Je bundelt al je uitkomsten en zet het op de agenda voor de wekelijkse meeting met het team. Je streept nog wat taken van je to-do af en je hoort je maag rammelen. Op naar de kantine voor een heerlijke lunch in de GoBistro.

Tijdens de pauze speel je een aantal potjes pool met Tom, en het is je eindelijk gelukt om hem te verslaan! Om zijn verlies te verzachten trakteer je hem op een verse smoothie van de Bakker Bart om de hoek. Na de pauze is het tijd voor een projectupdate met Lasse en Ilona: je bent bezig met een algoritme dat de advertentiebudgetten automatisch aanpast op basis van signalen uit de markt, maar de residuals van het onderliggende tijdseriemodel hebben niet de juiste verdeling. Na een tijd flink de hersenen te hebben gekraakt lossen jullie de moeilijke puzzel op. Samen bepaal je hoe het model moet worden aangepast en je gaat hier de rest van de middag mee aan de slag. Aan het eind van de dag controleer je het algoritme en ja hoor, het werkt perfect! Met een tevreden gevoel sluit je je computer af en besluit je om nog even naar de kantine te gaan: Tom wil graag een revanche voor de verloren pot van vanmiddag!

Wat kun je van ons verwachten?

Wat je er voor terug krijgt

Een uurloon tussen €9,45 (18 jaar) en €14,69 (21+ jaar).

De mogelijkheid om salarisstappen te maken binnen een half jaar, afhankelijk van je ontwikkeling en inzet.

Veel benefits, zoals kortingen en sportmogelijkheden.

Hoe het past naast studeren

Werken op een mooi kantoor in het centrum van Groningen.

Shifts van 4 of 8 uur, zelf in te delen van maandag t/m vrijdag.

Een flexibele planning die past in je studierooster.

Wat je ervan kunt leren

Persoonlijke en professionele ontwikkeling staan voorop.

Trainingen, 1-op-1 begeleiding & de uitdaging die bij jou past.

Je kunt zo hard gaan als je zelf wil.

Waarom het zo gezellig is

750 collega's met dezelfde drive.

Teamuitjes, bedrijfsfeesten en -festivals, elke vrijdag een VrijMiBo.

Een sloep om te varen door de Groningse grachten.

Wie ben jij?

Je volgt een wo-studie met een sterke analytische component. Je kunt gestructureerd werken en bent goed in het overzicht bewaren. Je hebt een goed gevoel voor data en bent analytisch ook ijzersterk. Je bent leergierig en gaat een uitdaging niet uit de weg. Je hebt een commerciële mindset waarmee je jouw werkzaamheden in perspectief van het bedrijf kunt plaatsen. Je bent 16u per week (of meer) beschikbaar op doordeweekse dagen tussen 8:30 – 17:00. Programmeerervaring (in bijvoorbeeld R of Python) is een pre. 

Fluency in the Dutch language is required for this role; candidates will be assessed accordingly.

Heb je vragen over deze vacature, dan kun je altijd contact opnemen met onze Talent & Recruitment Specialisten. Zij zijn op werkdagen bereikbaar tussen 9:00 en 17:30 op het telefoonnummer 050-2113856. Je kunt ook een mail sturen naar werken@belsimpel.nl.

Wil je weten hoe het sollicitatieproces eruit ziet? Klik dan hier.

Gomibo Woodstock

Ben jij er volgend jaar ook bij?
title: Data Analist Marketing (min. 16u/w)

companyDescription:
The Nationale Postcode Loterij is the largest charity lottery in the Netherlands. Every month, lottery players stand a chance to win great prizes and support charitable organisations working in the fields of human rights, nature and the environment. The Nationale Postcode Loterij mission is to contribute to a greener and fairer world and to raise awareness for the work carried out by these organisations.  
www.postcodeloterij.nl
descriptionText:
Job Description

Als Junior Data Analist laat je met heldere analyses zien hoe de Goede Doelen Loterijen de komende jaren nog verder kunnen groeien. Je geeft inzicht in onze huidige en potentiële deelnemers. Eén ding is zeker, met jouw werk lever je elke dag een bijdrage aan alle goede doelen die we steunen.

Maurits van den Brand, Data Analist: “Als Data Analist ben je continu aan het analyseren, optimaliseren en verbeteren. Tijdens lopende campagnes wordt er tussentijds veel geëvalueerd en waar nodig bijgestuurd. Dat is het mooie van dit werk. Collega's hebben je nodig, je voegt echt iets toe.”

Dit Ga Je Doen

 Je haalt inzichten uit data, met name op het gebied van marketing.  Je onderhoudt en verbetert rapportages (Tableau, Google Analytics) die de bedrijfsdoelstellingen inzichtelijk maken.  Je analyseert, evalueert, adviseert en rapporteert over klantprogramma’s en campagnes (werving & behoud).  Je zet testen op en begeleidt ze ten behoeve van optimalisatie en vernieuwing.  Je communiceert en presenteert gevonden analyse- en testresultaten, o.a. aan collega’s van marketing. 

Hier Herken Je Je Zelf In

 Je hebt een academisch werk- en -denkniveau (wo).  Je hebt kennis van relevante analysetechnieken en een analytisch vermogen.  Je bent in staat om analyses uit te voeren en om te zetten naar bruikbare commerciële informatie.  Je hebt ervaring met SQL en Excel.  Je hebt goede communicatieve- en presentatievaardigheden. 

Over jouw toekomstige werkgever:  

De Postcode Lottery Group is een internationale marketing gedreven organisatie met een sociaal doel: we organiseren loterijen om geld in te zamelen voor een rechtvaardigere, groenere en gezondere wereld.  Ons concept zorgt voor een win-win situatie: deelnemers van de Postcode Loterij en de VriendenLoterij winnen geweldige prijzen én goede doelen ontvangen geld.  

Zo hebben we sinds 1989 al meer dan € 12,6 miljard opgehaald voor honderden goede doelen. Met 1.448 collega’s in Nederland, Zweden, Groot-Brittannië, Duitsland en Noorwegen draag je elke dag bij aan een betere wereld.  

Jouw Toekomstige Afdeling

Het inzetten van data, inzichten en AI biedt grote kansen voor zowel Nederland als de andere landen waar de Loterijen actief zijn. Internationaal geven we dit vorm met de International Analytics Hub (Hub). Met de Hub wordt er gewerkt aan een nieuwe standaard in de manier waarop we met data, inzichten en AI onze ambities bereiken.

De expertise Analytics richt zich op het leveren van bruikbare inzichten en strategische analyses voor onze beide Loterijen. Daarnaast gaan ze intensief samenwerken met de Hub op verschillende internationale onderwerpen. Op de afdeling Analytics werk je met ruim vijftig collega’s in cross-disciplinaire teams aan intelligence en technologie. Het team bestaat uit product owners, data scientists, analisten, developers, testers en scrummasters. Allemaal hebben we één ding gemeen: we willen graag werken voor tevreden deelnemers, een betere wereld en blije collega’s.

Hier  word je blij van:  

 Een salaris tussen de € 4.000,- en € 4.600,- een variabele eindejaarsbonus, een uitstekende pensioenregeling en 28 vakantiedagen per jaar op basis van 40 uur en flexibele werktijden.   We vinden het belangrijk dat je je blijft ontwikkelen, professioneel en persoonlijk, dus het volgen van opleidingen en cursussen juichen we toe. Er zijn talloze mogelijkheden om door te groeien binnen de organisatie. Daarnaast biedt onze Lottery Academy een uitgebreid aanbod aan trainingen.   Je gaat werken in ons duurzame pand, op loopafstand van station Amsterdam Zuid; daarom krijg je een NS Business Card waarmee je gratis reist met trein, bus, tram en metro. Door heel Nederland en ook buiten werktijd!   We vieren graag onze successen. Denk aan drukbezochte maandborrels en feesten met collega’s en onze goede doelen partners.     Bewegen én ontspannen is goed voor je. Er zijn gratis bootcamp-, pilates- en kickbokslessen en er traint een groep collega’s voor hardloopevenementen. Ook kun je gratis naar ruim 150 musea en krijg je korting bij bijvoorbeeld theaters en bioscopen.   Je krijgt 100% betaald tijdens je geboorte- en ouderschapsverlof.   We betrekken je graag bij het werk van onze goede doelen partners, onder andere door projectbezoeken en lezingen in ons Auditorium. Daarnaast mag je, eventueel samen met collega's, onder werktijd drie dagen vrijwilligerswerk doen.   

Je bent welkom: 

Wij geloven dat een inclusieve organisatie de beste voedingsbodem is voor creativiteit, samenwerking en innovatie. We hechten bovendien grote waarde aan onderlinge verbondenheid. Al onze collega’s spelen daarbij een rol: zij zijn de Loterijen. We streven ernaar dat iedereen zich bij ons thuis voelt. Dit vraagt om een open blik en oog hebben voor elkaar.  

Denk jij bij ons te kunnen groeien en een waardevolle bijdrage te leveren aan onze organisatie? Je bent welkom, ongeacht je roots, religie, leeftijd, arbeidsvermogen of levensovertuiging. 

Enthousiast geworden?  

Solliciteer door middel van het opsturen van je CV en motivatie t.a.v. Maria-Christina Kool, Recruitment Business Partner via  werkendoejebij.nl  . Wil je meer informatie? Maria staat je graag te woord via +31657307901. 

De vacature staat niet open voor bemiddeling door bureaus, acquisitie wordt niet op prijs gesteld.
recruiter/headline: Recruitment Business Partner at The Dutch Postcode Lottery

descriptionText:
TELUS International AI-Data Solutions partners with a diverse and vibrant community to help our customers enhance their AI and machine learning models. The work of our AI Community contributes to improving technology and the digital experiences of many people around the world. Our AI Community works in our proprietary AI training platform handling all data types (text, images, audio, video and geo) across 500+ languages and dialects. We offer flexible work-from-home opportunities for people with passion for languages. The jobs are part-time, and there is no fixed schedule. Whoever you are, wherever you come from, come join our global AI community.  We are hiring freelance (English & Dutch speaking) Online Data Analysts for a project aimed at improving the content and quality of digital maps, which are used by millions of users globally. The job would suit someone who is detail-oriented, likes doing research and has a good knowledge of national and local geography. This is a freelance position on a flexible schedule - you can work in your own time whenever work is available. You will be completing research and evaluation tasks in a web-based environment, eg verifying and comparing data, determining the relevance and accuracy of information. You will be provided with guidelines for each task, which need to be followed. The project offers a variety of tasks, and work is paid per task. 
RequirementsFull Professional Proficiency in English & DutchYou must be living in Netherlands the last 2 consecutive yearsAbility to follow guidelines and do research online using search engines, online maps and website informationYou must have familiarity with current and historical business, media, sport, news, social media and cultural affairs in NetherlandsBeing open to work across a diverse set of Task Types (e.g. Maps, News, Audio tasks, Relevance)Applicants must be 18 years or over. 
Working on this project will require you to go through a standard recruitment process (including passing an open book assessment). This is a long-term project and your work will occasionally be subject to quality assurance checks. 
Why Join the TELUS International AI Community? Earn additional income with flexible hours to fit your lifestyleBetter work-life balanceBe your own bossComplimentary Well-Being package encompassing a wealth of well-being resources.Be part of an online community
PaymentRate of pay per task is inclusive of reading task guidelines. Payment will be issued in accordance with the terms of the contributor agreement upon successful completion of tasks.
