companySlogan: Samen staan wij voor de veiligheid van mens, dier en natuur. Nu en in de toekomst.
descriptionText:
Functieomschrijving

Ben jij klaar om een cruciale rol te spelen bij het verwezenlijken van de ambitieuze doelen van de afdeling Financiën & Control van de Nederlandse Voedsel- en Warenautoriteit (NVWA)? Wil jij de wereld van data-gedreven werken naar nieuwe hoogten tillen? Als ervaren financieel professional met up-to-date kennis op het gebied van data-analyse en dashboardbouw, hebben wij de perfecte uitdaging voor jou als Financieel Data Analist.

Stap in de dynamische wereld van de directie Interne organisatie, afdeling Financiën & Control, team Financiële Verslaglegging (FV), waar het cluster Financiële Data & BI de leiding neemt in het ontwikkelen van geavanceerde financiële data- en informatieproducten voor de gehele NVWA. Hier bundelen we gespecialiseerde financiële kennis met daadkracht om innovatieve data- en informatieproducten te creëren. Het cluster fungeert als drijvende kracht achter de verschuiving naar data-gedreven werken binnen de financiële functie.

Wat ga je doen?

In het stimulerende cluster Financiële Data & BI, bestaande uit drie gedreven professionals binnen het team Financiële Verslaglegging, ligt een unieke kans op jou te wachten. De rol biedt niet alleen veel vrijheid, maar ook een breed scala aan data-gerichte taken. Als Financieel Data Analist draag je bij aan de uitbreiding van het Dashboard Financieel met nieuwe pagina'’s en datamodellen. Daarnaast neem je ad-hoc verzoeken van de afdeling op en ben je verantwoordelijk voor het ontwikkelen van nieuwe dashboards met de process mining software van Celonis, waarbij je nauw samenwerkt met data analisten van andere overheidsorganisaties. Je wordt tevens de go-to expert op het gebied van process mining. Daarnaast ondersteun je collega's met Excel Power Query en draag je bij aan het onderhoud van metadata en informatieproducten.

Wij hechten waarde aan goede dienstverlening, een iteratieve werkwijze en korte communicatielijnen. Daarom zoeken wij een nieuwe collega die uitblinkt in samenwerking, structurering en daadkracht. Als communicatief vaardige professional vind je het leuk om collega’s te ondersteunen, en je scherpe en kritische blik draagt bij aan het bereiken van de beste resultaten voor de NVWA. Ons team werkt op woensdagen gezamenlijk op kantoor in Utrecht, terwijl we op andere dagen flexibel kunnen kiezen tussen thuiswerken en kantoor, afhankelijk van de taken van dat moment.

Als Financieel Data Analist rapporteer je aan de teamleider Financiële Verslaglegging en stem je je werkzaamheden functioneel af met de coördinator van cluster Financiële Data & BI. Het is belangrijk om te benadrukken dat hoewel we veel vrijheid hebben, het ontwikkeltraject van data- en informatieproducten mede afhankelijk is van de afdeling Informatie Management van de NVWA en de ICT-dienstverlener van de NVWA. Tot slot maakt een assessment onderdeel uit van het sollicitatietraject, waarbij we streven naar de beste match voor deze uitdagende functie. Ben jij klaar voor deze stimulerende kans? Wij verwelkomen jouw sollicitatie met open armen!

Functie-eisen

Afgeronde opleiding op minimaal HBO-niveau in richting accounting, control of data science.Aantoonbare, relevante, meerjarige ervaring in een financiële functie.Relevante ervaring op het werkterrein van de data analist (o.a. programmeren en analyseren).Affiniteit met gestructureerd werken in een dynamische omgeving.Doorzetten, effectief kunnen omgaan met weerstand, klantgericht, analytisch sterk, oplossingsgericht, samenwerken.Goede beheersing van de Nederlandse taal (lezen, schrijven én spreken) is een absolute vereiste.

Competenties 

Accuraat werkenAnalyserenPlannen en organiserenSamenwerken

Arbeidsvoorwaarden

Salarisniveau

schaal 10



Maandsalaris: Min €3091 - Max €4921
title: Financieel data analist

companyDescription:
We are an independent consultancy firm which integrates 140 years of engineering expertise with digital technologies and software solutions.

As consulting engineers, we care deeply about our people, our clients and society at large. Through our mission Enhancing Society Together, we take responsibility for having a positive impact on the world. We constantly challenge ourselves and others to develop sustainable solutions to local and global issues related to the built environment.
companySlogan: Enhancing Society Together
descriptionText:
De wereld van asset management transformeert. Nieuwe uitdagingen, scherpere behoeftes en hogere verwachtingen van stakeholders maken dat we de wereld van asset management opnieuw moeten uitvinden. Eén van de belangrijkste ontwikkelingen hierin is het gebruik van data en de inzet van nieuwe en moderne technologie. De omslag van onze klanten naar een digitaal en datagedreven manier van asset management is echter niet zo eenvoudig gemaakt.

Voor ons groeiende team in het asset management domein zoeken we een Business Intelligence Consultant die bij onze klanten datagedreven asset management gaat vormgeven. Maak jij met jouw IT- en data-expertise het verschil?

Wat je doet als Business Intelligence Consultant

Als BI Consultant ben je de drijvende kracht achter innovatieve en digitale oplossingen voor onze klanten. Vanuit je natuurlijke nieuwsgierigheid duik je in de business en de processen van onze klanten, op zoek naar optimalisatiemogelijkheden. Dit betekent dat je je onder andere bezig houdt met:

Het vertalen van klantvragen naar digitale producten en diensten. Hierbij vorm je de brug tussen de klant, IT en techniek. Natuurlijk samen met je collega’s.Het bouwen aan een datalandschap waarmee we kunnen rapporteren over de KPI’s die we samen met onze klanten zijn overeengekomen.Het bouwen van oplossingen die aansluiten op de wensen van de klant. Variërend van het adviseren van de klant over toekomstige innovaties, automatiseren van processen tot het ontwikkelen van (PowerBI) dashboards.Het bijdragen aan trainingen die de kennisontwikkeling over data stimuleren.

Daarnaast draag je ook bij aan de ontwikkeling van ons groeiende team, waarbij je een belangrijke rol speelt in digitale innovaties. Je geeft daarbij invulling aan de digitale roadmap van de afdeling waarin alle projecten rondom digitalisering samenkomen.

Waar je komt te werken

Royal HaskoningDHV is een onafhankelijk bureau dat 140 jaar advies- en ingenieurskennis integreert met digitale technologie en software-oplossingen. Onze ruim 6.000 collega’s werken, verspreid over kantoren in meer dan 20 landen, samen met klanten aan toekomstbestendige oplossingen voor een betere leefomgeving en de transitie naar een slimme, duurzame organisatie. Met onze ambitie willen we samen met onze opdrachtgevers een positieve bijdrage leveren aan de volgende generaties. Duurzaamheid neemt daarin een centrale plek in. Wij zijn een divers bedrijf: van slimme ingenieurs, tot vaardige projectmanagers en bedreven consultants die goed zijn in het bedenken en ontwerpen van intelligente steden, luchthavens, havens, infrastructuur, gebouwen en nog veel meer. In een steeds sneller tempo verbinden we de beste en slimste mensen ter wereld en ondersteunen zo onze klanten met een betere en snellere uitvoering van hun duurzame ambities. Dat noemen we: ‘Enhancing Society Together’.

Je komt te werken binnen de adviesgroep Asset Management. Deze bestaat uit zo’n 180 collega’s verspreid over verschillende kantoren in Nederland zoals Amersfoort, Amsterdam, Eindhoven en Maastricht. Welk kantoor jouw standplaats wordt, dat bepalen we samen, onder andere op basis van je woonplaats. En omdat samenwerken ook gebaat gaat bij fysiek samen zijn, ontmoeten we elkaar regelmatig op een van deze locaties.

Vanuit de adviesgroep werken wij voor verschillende (grote) klanten in onder andere de energie, bancaire, logistieke en industriële sector. Onze opdrachtgevers willen allemaal hun Asset Management organisatie transformeren. Denk hierbij aan civiele infrastructuur, gebouwen en gebouw gerelateerde installaties. Het integreren van het digitale component wordt daarin steeds belangrijker.

Je wordt binnen de adviesgroep onderdeel van het team Data & Digital. Dit team heeft als doel om digitaal en datagedreven asset management verder te ontwikkelen en uit te bouwen.

Wat je met ons gemeen hebt

In ons groeiende team omarmen we diversiteit en authenticiteit. Dit betekent dat we benieuwd zijn naar jouw verhaal, ontwikkeling en achtergrond. En hierbij kijken we verder dan alleen je diploma. Wat ons samenbrengt is enthousiasme, toewijding en eigen persoonlijkheid met hart voor een duurzame toekomst. Daarin maken samenwerkingsgerichtheid en het nemen van initiatief ons succesvol.

We vinden het belangrijk dat je bij ons goed op je plek zit en dat je jezelf kunt ontwikkelen op zowel persoonlijk als professioneel vlak. Herken je je in bovenstaande karaktereigenschappen en in de onderstaande punten? Dan zouden we een hele goede match kunnen zijn. 

Je hebt een afgeronde hbo-/wo-opleiding in IT, data of soortgelijke richtingJe hebt kennis van het Power Platform (PowerBI, PowerApps, PowerAutomate)Je hebt ervaring in/kennis van de volgende zaken:Data visualisatie, data analyse en data modelleringData ScienceSQL/NoSQLAgileJe hebt analytische vaardigheden waarmee je relaties en verbanden legtJe bent communicatief en sociaal vaardig.Je hebt goede presentatie vaardigheden en bent in staat tot het effectief faciliteren van workshops

Aangezien onze klantenkring hoofdzakelijk Nederlands georiënteerd is en we weten hoe belangrijk dat gesprek bij het koffiezetapparaat is, vragen we vaardigheid van de Nederlandse taal op minimaal B2 niveau en de bereidheid om dit te blijven ontwikkelen.

Voldoe je niet aan alle bovenstaande punten, maar word je enthousiast van de rol? Dan nodigen we je van harte uit om toch te solliciteren. Wij geloven namelijk dat je dingen eigen kunt maken. Jouw verhaal is daarom ook meer dan het afvinken van de bovenstaande punten.

Dit krijg je van ons

Naast dat je je bij ons kunt ontwikkelen binnen de mooiste en uitdagendste projecten, bieden we je ook:

Een salaris tussen de €2905 en €5606 per maand, gebaseerd op jouw ervaring.Een goede balans tussen werk en privé, onder andere door een laptop en telefoon van de zaak zodat je kunt werken waar en wanneer je wil;28 vakantiedagen bij een fulltime dienstverband;Persoonlijk budget boven op je salaris dat je kunt gebruiken om bijvoorbeeld extra vakantiedagen te kopen. Je kunt dit ook laten uitbetalen;Een uitstekende pensioenopbouw via ons eigen pensioenfonds;Een goed bereikbare werkplek op een van onze kantoren én reiskostenvergoeding of een NS-Business Card;Volop opleidings- en ontwikkelmogelijkheden; we hebben voldoende aandacht voor jou en begeleiden je actief in je ontwikkeling;Ons uitdagende Young Professional Program waarin je je, samen met andere young professional binnen de organisatie, focust op het snel ontwikkelen van je hard en soft skills;Young Royal HaskoningDHV dat leuke events, workshops en excursies organiseert met collega’s binnen en buiten Nederland.


Ben jij onze nieuwe collega?

We maken graag kennis met je! Klik op de solliciteer button onder aan de pagina en upload je cv en motivatiebrief t.a.v. Joppe Ter Meer, Manager Data & Digital Asset Management. Heb je nog vragen? Neem dan contact op met Kevin Zandbergen, Recruiter Industry & Buildings, via kevin.zandbergen@rhdhv.com .
title: Business Intelligence Consultant

companyDescription: Accenture is a global professional services company with leading capabilities in digital, cloud and security. Combining unmatched experience and specialized skills across more than 40 industries, we offer Strategy and Consulting, Technology and Operations services and Accenture Song — all powered by the world’s largest network of Advanced Technology and Intelligent Operations centers. Our 710,000 people deliver on the promise of technology and human ingenuity every day, serving clients in more than 120 countries. We embrace the power of change to create value and shared success for our clients, people, shareholders, partners and communities. Visit us at https://www.accenture.com
companySlogan: We deliver on the promise of technology and human ingenuity. Let there be change.
descriptionText:
Are you ready to play a crucial role in solving technical data issues for leading companies in the world? You’ll work on innovative projects and develop your career, collaborating with the best teams in the world. At Accenture Song we offer you the right toolkit to further boost your career and seize great opportunities. We are looking for passionate, curious and team driven players who are ready to push the boundaries.

Your job With your efforts as a Data Analytics Consultant you play an important role in managing the marketing channels of our clients more effectively. You do this by implementing various systems that enable the collection, organization and insight of data. Think of Google Tag Manager, Google Analytics, Relay42 and Tealium. Before you start working on this, you first analyze the websites / apps of our clients and convert your findings into concrete web analytics measurement plans. Together with the client you determine which goals you want to measure and which data must be collected for this.

You then develop and supervise the briefings in which the technical adjustments are described, so that the data collection can be carried out in accordance with the measurement plan. We are increasingly establishing connections with CRM systems or other relevant data sources that enrich the profiles of the target groups and ensure that we can realize even more targeted (automated) marketing campaigns. We use data management platforms (DMPs) for this and in your role you are regularly involved in the (complex) implementation of these platforms.

Who We Are

Accenture Song accelerates growth and value for our clients through sustained customer relevance. Our capabilities span ideation to execution: growth, product, and experience design; technology and experience platforms; creative, media and marketing strategy and campaign, content and channel orchestration. Join us and bring to life bold ideas with the biggest impact through the unlimited potential of creativity, technology, and intelligence. Visit us at: www.accenture.com/song.

Song is one of five services that make up one Accenture – the others are Strategy & Consulting, Technology, Operations, and Industry X.

Here's What You'll Need


A completed Bachelor’s or Master's degree.

3-5 years of hands-on experience with implementing Customer Data Platforms, Server-side Data collection, platforms (such as) Google BigQuery.

Hands-on experience in writing Javascript code and preferably knowledge about HTML, CSS, Python and/or SQL.

You have the ambition to work for international clients and you have great communication skills.

Fluent in English, both verbally and written.

You are a real team player, client oriented and service minded. A true organizer who is able to keep a good overview and set the right priorities.


Bonus point if you


Have knowledge of digital marketing / advertising.

Have a (emerging) passion for data, personalisation and coding.

Are fluent in Dutch, both verbally and written.


What's In It For You

Accenture is a global company with a world-class brand and reputation. Our people are Change Makers, and to support them as an employer, we make five promises:


Work with flexibility, in a culture based on trust

Embrace a sustainable growth mindset

Live a human-led culture of Inclusion & Diversity by caring deeply for all our people.

Lead and transform our clients with technology

Connect with our global network of 700.000 colleagues.


These promises are reflected through our excellent employee benefits, including:


Unlimited learning: access to thousands of free courses, classes and workshops.

Flexible working hours (4x9) & work location.

Paid transport (budget for electric bicycle or car, NS-Business card).

Parental leave, Paternity leave for all non-birthing parents.

Pension scheme, discount on Accenture shares, annual bonus, collective health insurance scheme.


What we believe Accenture is an equal opportunity employer. Our leaders are committed to building a better, stronger and more equitable company for future generations to create positive, long-lasting change. Inclusion and diversity are fundamental to our culture and core values. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. Our rich diversity makes us more innovative and creative, which helps us better serve our clients and our communities.

Our position as partner to many of the world’s leading businesses, organizations and governments affords us both an extraordinary opportunity and a tremendous responsibility to make a difference. Sustainability is one of our greatest responsibilities, which we embed it into everything we do and for everyone we work with.

Accenture is committed to providing equal employment opportunities for all. Please let us know if you require reasonable accommodation to enable your participation in the recruitment process by emailing lisette.werkman@accenture.com. We will be happy to assist you.
title: (Senior) Data Analytics Consultant

companyDescription:
Coöperatieve Rabobank U.A. is a full-range financial services provider that operates on cooperative principles. Its origins lie in the local loan cooperatives that were founded in the Netherlands nearly 110 years ago by enterprising people who had virtually no access to the capital market.

Rabobank Group is comprised of independent local Rabobanks plus Rabobank Nederland, their umbrella organisation, and a number of specialist subsidiaries. Overall, Rabobank Group has approximately 61,100 employees (in FTEs), who serve about 10 million customers in 47 countries.
descriptionText:
You are impacting the quality and quantity of data availability to build Credit Risk Models.
You and your jobThe work you do will impact your team and your internal and external stakeholders, and ultimately also the client servicing process and therefore the bank’s core business. Our Data Chapter colleagues have been able to incorporate sophisticated data sources into the latest projects. The projects vary from the credit risk to the reporting domain. This directly impacts the way Rabobank actively serves its clients. Also it directly contributes to the bank’s financial stability and allows the regulators to see we’re in control.
Practical Examples Source Data for Credit Risk ModelsHistorical Datasets of 20 years.Analysing Databases.
Facts & Figures36 or 40 hours per week43,000 Rabobank colleagues around the world
Top 4 ResponsibilitiesAnalysis and determination of the scope of data to be archived to Modeldata-HiSDA (Highly Secured Data Archive) of a decomissioned system.Analysis and determination of the scope of sources from GDP to Modeldata- HiSDA. Due to GDPR retention.Reasoning from the mandate for HiSDA and data products in these analyses.Guiding the team on how to store data so it can be used for Credit Modelling.As a Data Analyst you will be working in the Chapter Data Modelling & Insights. You will be working on projects mainly focused on Credit Modelling and will collaborate a lot with different colleagues in the Tribe Data Factory and Tribe Credit Analytics.
Together we achieve more than aloneWe believe in the power of diversity. Bringing together people's differences is what makes us an even better bank. So we are very curious about what you can bring to our Chapter Data Modelling & Insights.“As member in the Area Model Data you are working together in a very motivated hybride team of 14 people who are focused on data archiving and sourcing for Credit Risk Modelling”Arjan Schoutens, Product Manager ModeldataAround 240 professionals in Chapter Data, are teaming up in several area’s and squads to support the tribes within our finance and risk domain of the bank. Working together is the way we work; as one creative problem solving team of experts at Rabobank. Talking of Rabobank: We are a Dutch bank that operates in 38 countries for over 9,500,000 customers. Together with these customers, our members and partners we stand side by side to create a world in which everyone has access to enough healthy food. In the Netherlands we work to create a country in which people are happy with how they live, work and do business.
You and your talent You have a Master degree in a quantitative field or IT, or Finance/Economics.You have at least 5 year relevant banking experience within the financial industries sector.You have strong analytical and conceptual skills and you have gained experience in working with large volumes of data in complex data structures (un-transparent, low quality). MS SQL code is a must have, some Python is helpful too.Banking knowledge is preferred, especially of credit risk, financial markets and corporate banking products and processes, and how this is translated into data flows.Strong communication skills in English, both spoken and written
This Is What We Offer YouA gross annual salary between € 5.115,- and € 7.307,- per month based on 36 hours per week. Scale 10 (depending on your experience and seniority).thirteenth month's salary and 8% holiday allowance.an extra budget of 11% (depending on scale) of your gross salary to be used at your discretion. Buy extra holiday hours, add more to your pension savings or ask for part of the extra budget to be paid out.a pension scheme to which you contribute 3.5% or 5.5%.This is a selection of the terms of employment for a Analyst based on a 36-hour working week (40 hour contract is possible too). You can find all terms of employment on rabobank.jobs/en/conditions-of-employment.This is a selection of the terms of employment for a Data Analyst based on a 36 hour working week. You can find all terms of employment on rabobank.jobs/en/conditions-of-employment.
You and the job application processAny questions about the job content? Contact: Marco Aarts, Chapterlead Data Modelling & Insights via marco.aarts@rabobank.nl]Any questions about working at Rabobank and the process? Lex Verwayen, Corporate Recruiter via lex.verwayen@rabobank.nl.We will hold the interviews through a video call.You can find answers to the most frequently asked questions on rabobank.jobs/en/faq.A security check is part of the process.We respect your privacy.
#dataanalyst #rabobank #creditrisk
title: Data Analyst Credit Modelling

companyDescription:
LIFT International is a fast-growing, niche recruitment firm specializing in upper-level positions within the High-frequency Trading industry. Our goal is to change the world of recruitment whilst promoting strong values in terms of inclusivity, transparency and quality of service. We operate on a fully-remote basis allowing us to provide our high-quality recruitment services worldwide. 

Founded in 2017 and backed by one of the biggest IT consultancies in the Netherlands we have established our place in the market as the #1 technical recruitment services provider for many of the biggest High-frequency Trading firms in the world.
companySlogan: Changing the World of Recruitment
descriptionText:
Do you have an interest or a passion for trading? Would you like to work in the heart of Amsterdam in a fast-growing company? Do you enjoy dynamic and collaborative environments where people get the chance to create a real impact?
This job opportunity might be for you, then :)
What will you do?You will join one of the Trading teams. Your primary responsibilities will be to analyze global markets. On top of that, you will develop and optimize profitable trading strategies.
Who are you?· You have at least 3 years of experience working as a Quant Researcher· You are proficient in Python and C++· You are able to conduct original research and carry a project to completion within a short period· You know probability theory and mathematical statistics· You have a basic knowledge and interest in Machine learning (knowledge of implementing algorithms is a plus!)· You hold a degree in math, physics, computer science, or another related field

Some of the benefits· Opportunity to work alongside industry experts· Performance-based variable pay with a fair bonus structure sharing company profits among software engineers, traders, and researchers.· Relocation package for international candidates, VISA sponsorship and expat support.· Meals provided during work hours.· Social events and after-work gatherings.

Please feel free to apply here or get in touch with Alexandra.udriste@liftinternational.euLooking forward to having a chat!
recruiter/headline: Technical Recruiter
title: Quantitative Researcher

companyDescription:
Yacht is dé organisatie van en voor professionals. Wij zijn continu op zoek naar de juiste verbinding tussen professionals en onze toonaangevende opdrachtgevers. We hebben het vrijwel nooit mis. Hoe dat kan? 

Dat komt doordat we zowel de professionals als onze opdrachtgevers écht kennen. Wij selecteren onze professionals op uitmuntend vakmanschap én op die speciale mix van skills. Deze combinatie zorgt ervoor dat zij het verschil kunnen maken. Met als ultiem doel: optimaal resultaat leveren en de organisaties van onze opdrachtgevers blijvend verbeteren. 

Wij specialiseren ons vanuit acht kantoren door heel Nederland in acht vakgebieden: 

IT, Finance, Engineering, Legal, HRM, Marketing & Communications, Supply Chain Management & Procurement en Sociaal Domein.
companySlogan: Pushing Horizons
descriptionText: Ben jij een gedreven Data Analist met een scherp oog voor inzichten en de ambitie om een impact te maken? Wil jij jouw analytische vaardigheden benutten bij gerenommeerde organisaties zoals UWV, DUO, Belastingdienst, Gemeenten, Ziekenhuizen en onderzoeksinstanties, en vele anderen? Bij Yacht krijg je de mogelijkheid om tijdelijke opdrachten aan te gaan bij zowel profit- als non-profitklanten. De belangrijkste vraag voor ons, waar wordt jij blij van! Je zult relevante (informatie)bronnen creëren, verzamelen, analyseren en interpreteren, en deze vertalen naar stuurinformatie, klantinzichten en adviezen om input te leveren voor beleidsvorming. Met jouw vaardigheden draag je snel en efficiënt bij aan de professionalisering en kwaliteitsverbetering van de dienstverlening van onze klanten, en neem je de organisatie mee in de transitie naar een 'data-driven company'. Onze Klanten: Onze klanten hebben vaak opdrachten waarbij ze slimme digitale oplossingen, tools en applicaties ontwikkelen, zodat hun medewerkers data-gedreven beslissingen kunnen nemen. Yacht is voortdurend op zoek naar Nederlandstalige dataspecialisten om als consultant aan de slag te gaan. Wat Ga Je Doen? Als Data Analist bij Yacht krijg je de unieke kans om bij verschillende toonaangevende organisaties in Nederland te werken. Je wordt betrokken bij uitdagende projecten waarbij je data analyseert, inzichten genereert en advies uitbrengt ter ondersteuning van besluitvorming. Of het nu gaat om het optimaliseren van financiële processen bij een bank, het verbeteren van productie-efficiëntie bij een high-tech bedrijf of het analyseren van beleidsresultaten bij de overheid, jouw expertise maakt het verschil. Als jij in staat bent om op innovatieve en creatieve wijze grote hoeveelheden data om te zetten in zinvolle inzichten, dan kom ik graag met je in gesprek.Functie-eisen Minimaal 4 jaar ervaring als data analyst of een andere data gefocuste rol , bij voorkeur binnen een grote zakelijke omgeving of bij (semi-)overheidsinstantiesAfgeronde HBO/WO opleiding, bij voorkeur een econometrische, statistische, wiskundige en/of technische achtergrondWerkervaring met programmeren, bijvoorbeeld met SQL, SAS, of PythonSterke vaardigheden in het mondeling en schriftelijk presenteren van resultaten in de Nederlandse taalAnalytisch sterk met een praktische instelling en een grote mate van zelfstandigheidNederlandstaligHet is een grote pré wanneer je ook ervaring hebt met visualisatietools zoals Power BI, Tableau, en/of QlikView.  Arbeidsvoorwaarden Primaire arbeidsvoorwaarden Salaris oplopend van €4300 tot € 5000 bruto per maand o.b.v. 36 uur per week. (Medior, 3-6 functiejaren, inschaling)Kwartaalbonus of 13e maand, afhankelijk van de geldende arbeidsvoorwaarden bij opdrachtgever8,33% vakantiegeld Contractvorm Minimaal een jaarcontract, waar we graag toewerken naar een onbepaalde tijdscontractJe krijgt altijd 100% van jouw salaris betaald gedurende jouw arbeidsovereenkomst Secundaire arbeidsvoorwaarden Pensioen Plus regeling (pensioenopbouw vanaf dag 1)Yacht Academy: 5000+ extern ingekochte opleidingen om uit te kiezenNetto €750,- om jouw thuiswerkplek in te richtenMogelijkheid referral bonus (€1.500 per aangedragen professional die start op opdracht)25 vakantiedagen per jaar o.b.v. 40 uurReiskostenvergoedingThuiswerkvergoeding
title: Data Analist Regio Rotterdam/Den Haag

companyDescription:
Goed eten. Daar houden we van. Bij PLUS staat aandacht voor goed eten centraal. Want goed eten is belangrijk, voor iedereen elke dag. En dat is waar het bij PLUS om draait. Aandacht voor goed eten zit dan ook verweven in onze identiteit en waarden, en we raken er niet over uitgepraat. Daarom selecteren wij pure, verse producten met een duidelijke herkomst en veel smaak. Lekker eten gemaakt vanuit liefde voor het ambacht en met aandacht voor mens, milieu en dierenwelzijn. Daarnaast willen we dat goed eten voor iedereen toegankelijk is. We helpen dan ook graag om goed, lekker eten op tafel te zetten. En bieden een snelle, persoonlijke service – zowel in de winkel als online. Ten slotte vinden wij dat goed eten betaalbaar moet zijn. Daarom kopen wij onze producten grootschalig in en zorgen wij wekelijks voor aantrekkelijke aanbiedingen.

Omdat onze 218 ondernemers en hun 262 supermarkten midden in de buurt staan, kunnen zij inspelen op de wensen van de consument. Zo zijn we groot genoeg om het verschil te maken, en klein genoeg om flexibel te zijn. 

Serviceorganisatie PLUS Retail 
PLUS Retail B.V. is de serviceorganisatie achter de PLUS supermarkten. De PLUS Retail organisatie bestaat uit het servicekantoor in Utrecht, drie regionale distributiecentra in Haaksbergen, Ittervoort en Hendrik-Ido-Ambacht, en een landelijk distributiecentrum in Middenbeemster. PLUS Retail ondersteunt zo de aangesloten ondernemers maximaal bij de exploitatie van hun bedrijf.
companySlogan: Goed eten, daar houden we van.
descriptionText:
Wat ga je doen?

Ben jij die schakel die bedrijfseisen naadloos kan vertalen naar technische en functionele specificaties?

Heb je een passie voor innovatie en wil je een cruciale rol spelen in de toekomst van bijvoorbeeld winkelervaringen en supply chain bij PLUS Retail? Dan is dit dé rol voor jou!

Wat ga je als Informatieanalist doen? 

Als Informatie Analist bij PLUS duik je in interessante projecten. Je wordt onderdeel van een dynamisch team van zeven specialisten, waar je samenwerkt aan het optimaliseren van systemen en processen. Denk bijvoorbeeld aan het uitrollen van nieuwe zelfscansystemen voor onze winkels en het ontwikkelen van een communicatie app voor onze medewerkers.

Jouw verantwoordelijkheden 

Je vertaalt de wensen van de business naar technische en functionele specificaties. Je toetst en beoordeelt leveranciersvoorstellen en wijzigingsverzoeken. Je deelt kennis delen over systemen, processen en ondersteunt bij vragen. Je draagt bij aan verbeteringen binnen de organisatie en klantondersteuning. 

Wie ben je?

Je hebt een HBO-diploma in software-engineering, informatica, informatietechnologie of bedrijfseconomie. Je hebt al enige ervaring als Informatie-, Business- of Procesanalist, Applicatiebeheerder en/of Software Ontwikkelaar. Je hebt kennis van integraties zoals JSON, Webservices, API's, REST. Heb je affiniteit met winkel- en/of logistieke processen dan is dit een pré. Heb je daarnaast ook nog kennis van UML, User Stories en Enterprise Architectuur? Dan is dat helemaal mooi meegenomen! 

Wat bieden we je?

Voor deze rol ontvang je een bruto jaarsalaris tussen €43.901 - €66.495 (excl. vakantietoeslag) op basis van 36 uur per week en op basis van je kennis en ervaring; Variabele beloningsregeling van 3% 6 weken vakantie per kalenderjaar; 8% vakantietoeslag; Budget om je thuiswerkplek in te richten; Een laptop en telefoon; Bij PLUS zorgen we goed voor elkaar, dat betekent ook: wekelijkse bootcampsessies en gratis fruit; Tot slot vinden we het belangrijk dat je jezelf kunt blijven ontwikkelen binnen PLUS! 

Ben je enthousiast geworden over de rol als Informatieanalist bij PLUS? En ga je samen met ons voor het beste resultaat? Solliciteer dan direct!

Of heb je nog vragen? Neem dan contact op met Francien Barske (senior corporate recruiter) via fbarske@plusretail.nl.

Interesse?

Hoe gaan we nu verder?  

Solliciteer direct en we nemen binnen 1 werkweek contact met je op. Eerste kennismaking. Je hebt een eerste gesprek met de hiring manager. Assessment. Na het eerste gesprek vragen we je een assessment te maken, zodat we je competenties kunnen toetsen. Het vervolggesprek. Smaakt het naar meer? Dan gaan we in het tweede gesprek nog verder in op de inhoud en bespreken we de resultaten van je assessment. Het aanbod. Is er een match? Dan begint jouw nieuwe uitdaging als Informatieanalist bij PLUS!
title: Informatieanalist

companyDescription: TELUS International AI Data Solutions partners with a diverse and vibrant community to help our customers enhance their AI and machine learning models. The work of our AI Community contributes to improving technology and the digital experiences of many people around the world. Our AI Community works in our proprietary AI training platform handling all data types (text, images, audio, video and geo) across 500+ languages and dialects. We offer flexible work-from-home opportunities and Onsite jobs in many regions for people with a passion for languages. We have both part-time jobs with no fixed schedule and onsite full-time jobs. Whoever you are, wherever you come from, come join our global AI Community. www.telusinternational.com
descriptionText:
TELUS International AI-Data Solutions partners with a diverse and vibrant community to help our customers enhance their AI and machine learning models. The work of our AI Community contributes to improving technology and the digital experiences of many people around the world. Our AI Community works in our proprietary AI training platform handling all data types (text, images, audio, video and geo) across 500+ languages and dialects. We offer flexible work-from-home opportunities for people with passion for languages. The jobs are part-time, and there is no fixed schedule. Whoever you are, wherever you come from, come join our global AI community.  We are hiring freelance (English & Dutch speaking) Online Data Analysts for a project aimed at improving the content and quality of digital maps, which are used by millions of users globally. The job would suit someone who is detail-oriented, likes doing research and has a good knowledge of national and local geography. This is a freelance position on a flexible schedule - you can work in your own time whenever work is available. You will be completing research and evaluation tasks in a web-based environment, eg verifying and comparing data, determining the relevance and accuracy of information. You will be provided with guidelines for each task, which need to be followed. The project offers a variety of tasks, and work is paid per task. 
RequirementsFull Professional Proficiency in English & DutchYou must be living in Netherlands the last 2 consecutive yearsAbility to follow guidelines and do research online using search engines, online maps and website informationYou must have familiarity with current and historical business, media, sport, news, social media and cultural affairs in NetherlandsBeing open to work across a diverse set of Task Types (e.g. Maps, News, Audio tasks, Relevance)Applicants must be 18 years or over. 
Working on this project will require you to go through a standard recruitment process (including passing an open book assessment). This is a long-term project and your work will occasionally be subject to quality assurance checks. 
Why Join the TELUS International AI Community? Earn additional income with flexible hours to fit your lifestyleBetter work-life balanceBe your own bossComplimentary Well-Being package encompassing a wealth of well-being resources.Be part of an online community
PaymentRate of pay per task is inclusive of reading task guidelines. Payment will be issued in accordance with the terms of the contributor agreement upon successful completion of tasks. 
What’s next? If this sounds like a role you’d be interested in taking on, please apply below. https://jobs.telusinternational.com/en_US/careers/PipelineDetail/Online-Data-Analyst-The-Netherlands/21408

descriptionText:
CONTRACT ROLE - POWER BI ANALYST - REMOTE IN EUROPE
Another role, with an existing client of Glocomms' has reached out in search of a Freelance Power BI Analyst to come join the team. Please find the details below!
ROLE: Power BI AnalystLOCATION: Remote in EuropeDURATION: 6-Month Day Rate Contract with Extension PossibleCLIENT: Leading European IT Solutions and Services Company, providing innovative solutions globally.
RESPONSIBILITIES:• Develop and maintain BI dashboards, incorporating change requests and schedule adjustments.• Analyse data sources and create relevant data models for reporting purposes.• Design visually appealing, interactive dashboards using Power BI tools.• Tailor customised reports to meet stakeholders' specific needs.
QUALIFICATIONS:• Proficiency in data analysis tools and programming languages like Power BI, Kibana, QuickSight, DAX Query, SQL, Python, M Query Language, and Power Query.• Expertise in optimizing Power BI report performance through techniques like query folding and visual and data model optimisation.• Familiarity with Power BI Administration, including gateways, user/report access, and workspaces.• Knowledgeable in integrating various data sources into Power BI, including relational databases, JSON format, and website analytics.
Please apply now, as interview slots are this week!
title: Power BI Analyst

companyDescription:
Who are we?

ASML is an innovation leader in the global semiconductor industry. We make machines that chipmakers use to mass produce microchips. Founded in 1984 in the Netherlands with just a handful of employees, we’ve now grown to over 40,000 employees, 143 nationalities and more than 60 locations around the world.

What do we do?

We provide chipmakers with hardware, software and services to mass produce patterns on silicon through lithography. Our lithography systems use ultraviolet light to create billions of tiny structures on silicon that together make up a microchip. We push our technology to new limits to enable our customers to create smaller, faster and more powerful chips.

Who are our people?

While you may think that only engineers and mathematicians work at ASML, you'll be surprised to find out that our people come from a wide variety of backgrounds. Across ASML, we have dedicated teams that manage customer support, communications and media, IT, software development and more. Every team in the company is essential for pushing our technology and the industry forward.

If you love to tackle challenges and innovate in a collaborative, supportive and inclusive environment with all the flexibility and freedom to unleash your full potential, ASML is the place to be.

Join us!
companySlogan: Changing the world, one nanometer at a time
descriptionText:
Introduction

Introduction

Are you upcoming talent driven by building an IT infrastructure that gathers data from several resources, processes it and visualizes it such that it can be used for strategic decision-making, then we are looking for you!

Background Information

The Development & Engineering Electrical Development (EDEV) Cluster is responsible for developing all electrical and electronics technology for ASML's machines. ASML achieves this through an integrated network of co-developers that works alongside ASML's own teams.

The EDEV Design Outsourcing team is responsible for managing EDEV's co-developer base. Data processing, centralization, visualization and analysis is key for successful allocation of projects to the right co-developer, follow-up on the project's progress, and effective reporting on the status of EDEV's outsourced activities.

Your Assignment

The EDEV Design Outsourcing Team has developed its initial IT infrastructure. This consists mainly of the following tech stack SharePoint Lists/Sites, Power Automate, Power BI and PowerShell.

In this internship, you will be working on the existing IT infrastructure and other responsibilities include

Add new features, automating it further and making it more robust and user-friendly.You will also be encouraged to provide new ideas and insights in how to improve the infrastructure (e.g., by using new technologies)Proactively involved in proposing new features in the IT infrastructure.Take part in team meetings, where you will be encouraged to brainstorm ideas with stakeholders in the business.Familiarize yourself with the basics of the EDEV Design Outsourcing Team

Your Profile

You are a student pursuing Bachelor in IT, Computer Science, or other relevant technical background.Proactive student with strong drive and can-do attitude.Experience in using Microsoft SharePoint, Power Automate, Power BI, PowerShell and Python.Good to have experience in Cloud development can be handy.

Please note that we can only consider students who are enrolled at a school for the entire duration of the internship.

Diversity and inclusion

ASML is an Equal Opportunity Employer that values and respects the importance of a diverse and inclusive workforce. It is the policy of the company to recruit, hire, train and promote persons in all job titles without regard to race, color, religion, sex, age, national origin, veteran status, disability, sexual orientation, or gender identity. We recognize that diversity and inclusion is a driving force in the success of our company.

Change the world – one nanometer at a time

Become an intern at a Dutch company that’s a global industry leader. You’ll gain valuable experience in a highly innovative environment – one that sparks your imagination and creativity. In addition to a monthly internship allowance of maximum €600 (plus a possible housing and free public transport), you’ll get practical guidance from experts in the field and the chance to work in and experience a dynamic team environment.

ASML be part of progress

ASML is a high-tech company headquartered in the Netherlands. We manufacture the complex lithography machines that chipmakers use to produce integrated circuits, or computer chips. What we do is at the heart of all the electronic devices that keep us informed, entertained and connected. Every day, you use electronics that simply wouldn’t exist without our machines.

Behind ASML’s innovations are engineers who think ahead. The people who work at our company include some of the most creative minds in physics, electrical engineering, mathematics, chemistry, mechatronics, optics, mechanical engineering, computer science and fields which are not technical oriented.

We believe we can always do better. We believe the winning idea can come from anyone. We love what we do – not because it’s easy, but because it’s hard.

Students getting ready for real-world R&D

We’re a global team of about 39,000 people of 140 different nationalities and counting. Headquartered in Europe’s top tech hub, the Brainport Eindhoven region in the Netherlands, our operations are spread across Europe, Asia and the US.

In such an environment, your colleagues may be sitting next door, or they could be thousands of kilometers away in a different country – or even working for a different company.

How will you be part of progress?
title: Computer Science Internship (Non-Thesis): Data Collecting, Processing, Visualization & Analysis

companyDescription:
Royal Schiphol Group is an airport company, owner, co-owner and partner in several Dutch and international airports. Our main airport is Amsterdam Airport Schiphol. It is the third largest airport in Europe, measured by the numbers of passengers and cargo. It has more than 2,000 employees who are guided by our 5 core values – to be reliable, efficient, hospitable, inspiring and sustainable. These values help us realise our ambitions to be Europe's Preferred Airport and the most sustainable hub airport in the world.

The magic of working at the airport is evident everywhere – whether you work in operations, at the head office or as a contractor. The complex, dynamic and diverse activities at the airport and in its job roles makes Royal Schiphol Group an ideal career hub for you.
descriptionText:
Nice to know (you)

At Schiphol, we are very ambitious when it comes to our future: we aim to operate the most sustainable airports in the world. Schiphol is committed to net-zero carbon for own emissions in 2030 and for the aviation sector by mid-century. In the past few years, Schiphol has achieved progress by many, bottom-up actions improving sustainability. We are going for it: creating the most sustainable and high-quality airports in the world. 


Connecting your world

As a Strategic Data Analyst, you will play a pivotal role in unlocking the potential of data to guide our business towards more sustainable practices. And how you approach this? That’s up to you. We trust in the way you connect with other people. You put your talents to work at:

Engaging with a broad stakeholder base to identify sustainability-related KPIs and data requirements, focusing for example on emissions, waste management, and energy efficiency. Facilitating stakeholder meetings, gather requirements, and align diverse interests towards the common goal of sustainability. Creating business value cases and prototypes, translating complex data insights into actionable sustainability strategies. Promoting data literacy and adoption within the organization, guiding teams on leveraging data products for sustainability. 


As a Strategic Data Analyst, we will develop a comprehensive overview of data flows and sources across multiple systems, culminating in the creation of a new data mart concept to be hosted on Databricks. This initiative aims to synergize data to generate greater value, with a team of data engineers from our Department executing the plan with your support.

You've got this

Schiphol connects your world. With the best people, we make travel safe and responsible. You contribute to this by analyzing problems, recognizing patterns and reasoning logically. The result? Insight and solutions. Also, you are the talent who smoothly builds strong bonds with others. In addition, for this position you have:

MSc in Business Analytics, Business Administration, Economics, Sciences, Mathematics or related fields with a strong understanding of data technologies and sustainability. Proven experience in stakeholder management, agile project management, and the ability to synthesize complex data into clear insights. Working knowledge of data-related tools, such as Python, PySpark, and experience in constructing data marts or lakes is highly desirable. Strong communication skills, adept at requirement gathering, data storytelling, and presenting outcomes. 


You get this

Schiphol connects your world. With the best people, we make travel safe and responsible. You contribute to this by analyzing problems, recognizing patterns and reasoning logically. The result? Insight and solutions. Also, you are the talent who smoothly builds strong bonds with others. In addition, for this position you have:

MSc in Business Analytics, Business Administration, Economics, Sciences, Mathematics or related fields with a strong understanding of data technologies and sustainability. Proven experience in stakeholder management, agile project management, and the ability to synthesize complex data into clear insights. Working knowledge of data-related tools, such as Python, PySpark, and experience in constructing data marts or lakes is highly desirable. Strong communication skills, adept at requirement gathering, data storytelling, and presenting outcomes. 


About The Team

The IT & Data department is creating the airport of the future. We do this using the smartest digital solutions, tools and applications. With state-of-the-art technology, we keep the airport running. Our enthusiastic team works on data-driven improvements in our processes, traveller flows and information provision. This is how we contribute to the best possible experience for travellers, customers and employees at and around the airport.

Choose your destination

What are your talents? What dreams do you have? What is your story? We are curious about you and invite you to apply. You can apply by sharing your motivation and resume with us via the application button below.

We would like to receive your application for this position of Strategic Data Analyst Sustainability before 31st of March 2024. Do you have questions about the application process? Contact Jesse Topelberg by sending a message to: jesse.topelberg@schiphol.nlFor more information about applying at Schiphol Group: Job application process - Werken bij Schiphol Group. For the safety of our passengers and colleagues, an security screening is always part of the recruitment process. 


About Schiphol Group

With 3,000 proud colleagues, we go the extra mile to connect the Netherlands with the rest of the world in the best possible way. Innovation, safety and cooperation are at the forefront. Together we give more meaning to travel and contribute to the economy and society. For more than 100 years. In the Netherlands and beyond. By the way, did you know that:

... Schiphol Group owns and operates Amsterdam Airport Schiphol, Rotterdam The Hague Airport and Lelystad Airport? We also have a majority stake in Eindhoven Airport. … Schiphol Airport has been running 100% on Dutch wind energy since 2018?wind energy. ... as a Strategic Data Analyst you will be joining the business area Data and Analytics ?
title: Strategic Data Analyst Sustainability

companyDescription: Signify (Euronext: LIGHT) is the world leader in lighting for professionals and consumers and lighting for the Internet of Things. Our Philips products, Interact connected lighting systems and data-enabled services, deliver business value and transform life in homes, buildings and public spaces. In 2022, we had sales of EUR 7.5 billion, approximately 35,000 employees and a presence in over 70 countries. We unlock the extraordinary potential of light for brighter lives and a better world. We achieved carbon neutrality in our operations in 2020, have been in the Dow Jones Sustainability World Index since our IPO for six consecutive years and were named Industry Leader in 2017, 2018 and 2019. News from Signify is located at the Newsroom, Twitter, LinkedIn and Instagram. Information for investors can be found on the Investor Relations page.
descriptionText:
We're looking for a Competitive Intelligence Analyst to join our Strategy and Market Insights team in Amsterdam.

Working for Signify means being creative and adaptive. Our culture of continuous learning and commitment to diversity and inclusion creates an environment that allows you to build your skills and career. Together, we’re transforming our industry.

As the world leader in lighting, we’re constantly ahead of the curve. Through our leadership in connected lighting and the Internet of Things, we’re breaking new grounds in data analytics, AI, and smart homes, offices, cities and more!

Signify is one of the few companies in the world to achieve carbon neutrality and our next sustainability goals are even bolder: doubling our positive impact on the environment and society by 2025.

Working as a Competitive Intelligence Analyst at Signify is dynamic. You will be part of the Strategy & Market Insights team within the broader Strategy & Sustainability function. The team consists of a broad range of backgrounds, including alumni from top-tier consulting firms, former equity analysts and research experts. We’re greater together through peer learning in our globally diverse team, with different backgrounds and nationalities.

Would you like to be part of an industry which is undergoing fundamental change driven by new technologies and digital transformation? Are you a highly talented analyst who can support our Leadership Team to make the right decisions? Would you like to work directly with the CEO and the executive team of the leader in lighting?

This is a unique opportunity to influence strategy, innovation and growth in a global company. We are looking for you if you can bring together the right balance of analytical insights, problem solving rigor, people skills, and pragmatism to turn your thinking into decisions and actions.

We’re on the lookout for forward-thinking innovators with a passion for sustainability. If you match this description, get in touch!

What you’ll do

Research in an efficient and ethical way data and information about various peers and competitor companies (secondary research techniques).Synthesize your findings and generate insightful analyses to drive senior leader decision-making.Prepare presentations and reports for senior leadership, including our Leadership Team and Board of Management.Stay abreast of relevant internal and external knowledge, and disseminate among stakeholders; introduce and implement new ideas for knowledge, tools, and operations.You will work both independently as well as part of a team on specific strategic projects – this can include managing a whole project work stream independently.

Your Qualifications

A master’s degree in business, science or engineering with an excellent academic track record.A minimum of 5 years’ experience in an analytical role (e.g., competitive intelligence, equity research, investment banking, consultancy or other relevant employment).Experience with analyzing companies and their financial statements.Excellent ability to run advanced search techniques.Strong problem solving and critical thinking skills; capable of driving insight to action.Experience with one or more advanced analytical tools such as Excel, SAS, SPSS, R, or Python.Fluency in written and spoken English; ability to speak another language (e.g., Dutch, German, Hindi, Mandarin Chinese) is helpful.

What you’ll get in return…

We’re offering multiple opportunities for career development, like mentoring, coaching and stretch assignments, with strong international exposure for dynamic profiles. Learning is fundamental to our culture. Through continuous learning, we are transforming the industry. You have the chance to learn every day, acquire new skills and perspectives through customized online programs, and on-the-job experiences.

See #SignifyLife through the eyes of our employees!

Who we are

Signify is the world leader in lighting. We provide professional customers and consumers with quality, energy-efficient LED lighting. And our lights, when connected, bring data to devices, apps and people – redefining what light can do and how you use it. Today, our innovations, such as LiFi – internet connectivity through light – and UV-C, solar and horticultural lighting, contribute to a safer, smarter, more sustainable world.

We’re operating in 74 countries with 37,000 people worldwide.
insightsV2/0: 10,001+ employees · Appliances, Electrical, and Electronics Manufacturing
title: Competitive Intelligence Analyst

companyDescription: We're a leading global eye health organization that is dedicated to protecting and enhancing the gift of sight for millions of people around the world – from the moment of birth through every phase of life. Our comprehensive portfolio of more than 400 products includes contact lenses, lens care products, eye care products, ophthalmic pharmaceuticals, over-the-counter products and ophthalmic surgical devices and instruments. Founded in 1853, we have a significant global research and development, manufacturing and commercial footprint with more than 12,000 employees and a presence in nearly 100 countries.
descriptionText:
See better. Live better

 Bausch + Lomb  is a leading global eye health organization that is dedicated to protecting and enhancing the gift of sight for millions of people around the world – from the moment of birth through every phase of life. Our comprehensive portfolio of more than 400 products includes contact lenses, lens care products, eye care products, ophthalmic pharmaceuticals, over-the-counter products, and ophthalmic surgical devices and instruments. Founded in 1853, we have a significant global research and development, manufacturing, and commercial footprint with more than 12,000 employees and a presence in nearly 100 countries.

The location of Schiphol-Rijk is responsible for the storage, sorting, and distribution of medical devices and contact lenses to the EMEA region. The characteristic of our location is the multicultural and informal environment where new colleagues will feel directly at home.

The Role

A Senior Data Analyst is responsible for collecting, cleaning, and analyzing data that can be used to improve business decisions. You must be able to understand business requirements and effectively communicate your findings to those who will make the decisions. You have strong analytical skills. You are a professional who takes data and figures out numerous measures, such as how to improve customer experience, increase operation productivity, and how to reduce transportation costs, to name a few. You deal with data handling, data modeling, and reporting.

Responsibilities

 Understanding the business and project goal and business problem, and collecting the right data.  Querying data from multiple sources/systems and building a quality data model.  Data Cleansing to make data usable for analysis.  Data Examining using programming languages and BI tools.  Interpreting Data to discover unseen business insights and create value from data.  Create reports and dashboards using visualization tools. These reports guide the leadership team to make timely decisions.  Collaborating with other teams: you interact with the management team, IT, and SMEs to ensure proper implementation of business requirements and figure out process improvement opportunities. 

Qualifications

 Bachelor/Master’s degree in any relevant field, statistics, Computer science, Data Science, Business Analytics, Engineering, Logistics, and Supply Chain Management. Supply chain Knowledge and a master's degree are a pulse.  +4 years work experience  Knowledge of Programming: You should be experienced in working with databases and data analysis tools. You should be proficient in Python or R. Knowledge of Gurobi is a plus.  Writing SQL queries to extract data from databases.  Understanding of Statistics and Machine Learning Algorithms: You must know concepts like probability distributions, hypothesis testing, regression analysis, and various classification and clustering techniques  Experienced with Power BI . Certified Power BI is a plus.  Excellent analytical and system thinking skills.  Good communication and presentation skills to convey your ideas to stakeholders.  Excellent documentation skills  Excellent planning, organizational, and time management skills  Supply chain/Logistics knowledge is a plus. 

What We Offer

 Labor contract for 12 months, to extend for an indefinite time;  Competitive salary;  Fulltime contract;  8% holiday allowance;  13th month;  25 leave days;  Commuting allowance. Full coverage for public transportation;  Participation retirement plan;  Free contact lenses from Bausch+Lomb; 

Culture

Trust, mutual respect and ethical behavior are essential to relationships with our professional eye care partners, our clients, our employees and our investors. In these relationships, we must conduct business according to the highest ethical standards - always ensuring that our conduct is in accordance with the letter and spirit of Company policies, laws and regulations - and with good business judgment. Through Bausch + Lomb's Code of Business Conduct and Ethics, we publicly commit every employee to the highest standards of business conduct and ethics - complying with laws, avoiding conflicts of interest, defeating competition ethically, meeting our business objectives properly, treat our diverse employees fairly and with respect, and maintaining a safe and healthy work environment for all employees. Every Bausch + Lomb employee has an obligation to conduct business in an ethical manner.

Acquisition by agency`s or interim candidates is not appreciated.
title: Senior Data Analyst

companyDescription: We're a leading global eye health organization that is dedicated to protecting and enhancing the gift of sight for millions of people around the world – from the moment of birth through every phase of life. Our comprehensive portfolio of more than 400 products includes contact lenses, lens care products, eye care products, ophthalmic pharmaceuticals, over-the-counter products and ophthalmic surgical devices and instruments. Founded in 1853, we have a significant global research and development, manufacturing and commercial footprint with more than 12,000 employees and a presence in nearly 100 countries.
descriptionText:
Who we are:See better. Live better Bausch + Lomb is a leading global eye health organization that is dedicated to protecting and enhancing the gift of sight for millions of people around the world – from the moment of birth through every phase of life. Our comprehensive portfolio of more than 400 products includes contact lenses, lens care products, eye care products, ophthalmic pharmaceuticals, over-the-counter products, and ophthalmic surgical devices and instruments. Founded in 1853, we have a significant global research and development, manufacturing, and commercial footprint with more than 12,000 employees and a presence in nearly 100 countries.The location of Schiphol-Rijk is responsible for the storage, sorting, and distribution of medical devices and contact lenses to the EMEA region. The characteristic of our location is the multicultural and informal environment where new colleagues will feel directly at home.
 Who you are: A Senior Data Analyst is responsible for collecting, cleaning, and analyzing data that can be used to improve business decisions. You must be able to understand business requirements and effectively communicate your findings to those who will make the decisions. You have strong analytical skills. You are a professional who takes data and figures out numerous measures, such as how to improve customer experience, increase operation productivity, and how to reduce transportation costs, to name a few. You deal with data handling, data modeling, and reporting.
Responsibilities: Understanding the business and project goal and business problem and collecting the right data.Querying data from multiple sources/systems and building a quality data model.Data Cleansing to make data usable for analysis.Data Examining using programming languages and BI tools.Interpreting Data to discover unseen business insights and create value from data.Create reports and dashboards using visualization tools. These reports guide the leadership team to make timely decisions.Collaborating with other teams: you interact with the management team, IT, and SMEs to ensure proper implementation of business requirements and figure out process improvement opportunities.
Qualifications:Bachelor/Master’s degree in any relevant field, statistics, Computer science, Data Science, Business Analytics, Engineering, Logistics, and Supply Chain Management. Supply chain Knowledge and a master's degree are a pulse.+4 years' work experienceKnowledge of Programming: You should be experienced in working with databases and data analysis tools. You should be proficient in Python or R. Knowledge of Gurobi is a plus.Writing SQL queries to extract data from databases.Understanding of Statistics and Machine Learning Algorithms: You must know concepts like probability distributions, hypothesis testing, regression analysis, and various classification and clustering techniques.Experienced with Power BI. Certified Power BI is a plus.Excellent analytical and system thinking skills.Good communication and presentation skills to convey your ideas to stakeholders.Excellent documentation skillsExcellent planning, organizational, and time management skillsSupply chain/Logistics knowledge is a plus.
What we offer:Labor contract for 12 months, to extend for an indefinite time;Competitive salary;Fulltime contract;8% holiday allowance;13th month;25 leave days;Commuting allowance. Full coverage for public transportation;Participation retirement plan;Free contact lenses from Bausch+Lomb;
CultureTrust, mutual respect and ethical behavior are essential to relationships with our professional eye care partners, our clients, our employees and our investors. In these relationships, we must conduct business according to the highest ethical standards - always ensuring that our conduct is in accordance with the letter and spirit of Company policies, laws and regulations - and with good business judgment. Through Bausch + Lomb's Code of Business Conduct and Ethics, we publicly commit every employee to the highest standards of business conduct and ethics - complying with laws, avoiding conflicts of interest, defeating competition ethically, meeting our business objectives properly, treat our diverse employees fairly and with respect, and maintaining a safe and healthy work environment for all employees. Every Bausch + Lomb employee has an obligation to conduct business in an ethical manner. Acquisition by agency`s or interim candidates is not appreciated.
title: Senior Data Analyst - Supply Chain

descriptionText:
TELUS International AI-Data Solutions partners with a diverse and vibrant community to help our customers enhance their AI and machine learning models. The work of our AI Community contributes to improving technology and the digital experiences of many people around the world. Our AI Community works in our proprietary AI training platform handling all data types (text, images, audio, video and geo) across 500+ languages and dialects. We offer flexible work-from-home opportunities for people with passion for languages. The jobs are part-time, and there is no fixed schedule. Whoever you are, wherever you come from, come join our global AI community.  We are hiring freelance (English & Dutch speaking) Online Data Analysts for a project aimed at improving the content and quality of digital maps, which are used by millions of users globally. The job would suit someone who is detail-oriented, likes doing research and has a good knowledge of national and local geography. This is a freelance position on a flexible schedule - you can work in your own time whenever work is available. You will be completing research and evaluation tasks in a web-based environment, eg verifying and comparing data, determining the relevance and accuracy of information. You will be provided with guidelines for each task, which need to be followed. The project offers a variety of tasks, and work is paid per task.

Working on this project will require you to go through a standard recruitment process (including passing an open book assessment). This is a long-term project and your work will occasionally be subject to quality assurance checks.

companyDescription:
Finance Club is een jonge organisatie die in 2015 is opgericht door twee oud-Deloitters. Hun ambitie is om oplossingen te bieden vanuit de inhoud met toegevoegde waarde voor kandidaat en klant. Wij willen de business, de uitdagingen en staffing-vraagstukken vanuit onze klant dan ook echt snappen. Vanuit hier streven we altijd naar de optimale oplossing. Dit doen wij binnen de  vakgebieden Compliance (KYC & AML), Finance, Risk & Audit, PMO en Data & Analytics. 

Ons team bestaat uit een groep jonge en enthousiaste professionals met een passie voor mensen. We werken vanuit een ondernemersdrive waarbij we streven naar de beste match tussen klant en kandidaat. Wij zoeken dan ook specifiek vanuit de vraag van de klant naar de beste kandidaat. Wij zetten hiervoor dan ook graag een stap extra. Dit doen we vanuit een eigen concept waarbij wij geloven in professionaliteit, investeren in relaties en persoonlijke aandacht.
companyName: Finance Club l Part of Projective Group
companySlogan: We love happy people!
descriptionText:
De afgelopen jaren is er binnen AAHG hard gewerkt om te voldoen aan de eisen die de Wet tegen Witwassen en Financiering van Terrorisme (Wwft) en het daarop gebaseerde ABN AMRO Customer Due Diligence (CDD) beleid voorschrijven. Daarmee zijn we er echter niet. De voortdurende ontwikkelingen op deze gebieden vragen om een blijvende focus en coördinatie met als doel de criminaliteit uit onze banksystemen te weren. Om onze ambities te realiseren hebben we in 2022 een nieuwe CDD afdeling opgezet; het Center of Expertise (CoE) CDD.

Het CoE CDD is de drijvende kracht op het CDD thema binnen AAHG, waarbij de afdeling de regie voert bij het voorkomen van witwassen, terrorismefinanciering en fraude binnen de verschillende hypotheekportefeuilles. De afdeling werkt hierin nauw samen met de centrale Detecting Financial Crime afdeling binnen ABN Amro. Het CoE CDD is in 2022 opgericht en is daardoor nog een relatief jonge afdeling. De afdeling maakt hiërarchisch onderdeel uit van Florius/Moneyou. In een dynamisch speelveld bouw je mee aan deze afdeling waar je focus ligt op het onderdeel data & reporting. Je zorgt er mede voor dat AAHG voldoet aan de laatste eisen uit wet- en regelgeving, analyseert data gerelateerde vraagstukken om te komen tot gedragen inzichten en verandervoorstellen en start zelf ook verbeterprojecten op.

Beschrijving

Het CoE CDD is een afdeling waar we CDD-expertise samenbrengen op de gebieden van procesdesign, innovatie & implementatie, performance management, data & reporting en knowledge/awareness. Door deze multidisciplinaire samenstelling leert iedereen van elkaar en worden we beter als geheel. En jij speelt hier als Business Analist met focus op data een belangrijke rol in!

Om voortdurend te kunnen verbeteren en blijvend te voldoen aan wet- en regelgeving, is het essentieel om goed voorbereid benodigde besluiten te nemen. Gezien de complexiteit van de op ons afkomende vraagstukken en de dynamische omgeving, is dat niet altijd even eenvoudig. Als Business Analist help jij AAHG bij deze uitdaging. Met jouw data vaardigheden analyseer je nieuwe vraagstukken en help je mee voorstellen, op basis van data, te onderbouwen. Je werkt aan nieuwe MI om het CoE CDD te voorzien van de benodigde inzichten en jouw data analyses vormen de basis voor het identificeren en mitigeren van risico’s.

Samen met je data & reporting collega’s ben je daarnaast verantwoordelijk voor:

Management informatie en rapportages (voor interne als externe stakeholders) op het vlak van CDD; Het uitvoeren van analyses hoe we het CDD proces kunnen versnellen, automatiseren en efficiëntie slagen kunnen behalen door het gebruik van nieuwe technologische ontwikkelingen; Het inrichten en uitvoeren van doorlopende data gedreven controles voor AAHG om eventuele CDD risico’s in kaart te brengen; Data gedreven inzichten leveren in diverse projecten/programma’s en ondersteunen bij het formaliseren en implementeren van oplossingen.Het verder optimaliseren van het data landschap.

Functie eisen

Als Business (Data) Analist ben jij een belangrijke schakel in het CDD data & reporting landschap en maak jij het verschil door het bieden van de juiste ondersteuning en analytische inzichten. Jij kijkt met een kritische blik naar de beschikbare data en informatie en wordt enthousiast van het delen van je bevindingen. Daarnaast neem je graag de verantwoordelijkheid en regie om kennis en inzichten te verzamelen en deze te vertalen naar scenario’s en voorstellen zodat je de organisatie in staat stelt de juiste keuzes te maken. Jij benadert vraagstukken met een open blik, bent nieuwsgierig, stelt vragen, analyseert, legt vast en adviseert. Daarbij kan je complexe zaken makkelijk uitleggen, waarbij je de business processen en het datalandschap begrijpt en overziet.

Denk je dat jij de juiste match bent? Check je profiel:

Je hebt minimaal 5 jaar werkervaring; Je hebt minimaal basis kennis en ervaring met SQL en PowerBI;Kennis van CDD-KYC processen en hypotheken is een pré; Ervaring als (data) analist (informatie verzamelen, rubriceren en interpreteren) is een must;Je bent goed in prioriteren en het bewaken van deadlines;Je kunt snel nieuwe informatie opnemen, analyseren, visualiseren en beschrijven;Je communiceert makkelijk met mensen van elk niveau in de organisatie;Je hebt een goede Nederlandse taalbeheersing (in woord en geschrift).

Uurtarief: max. €88.50 op basis van ervaring.

De opdracht loopt tot 30-9-2024 met een optie tot verlenging.
title: Business Data Analist CDD - ABN AMRO
